Review.Titre: Unable to cancel the order and receive credit
Review.Contenu: I called to cancel my order on Tuesday, 2 days ago (30 mins after I had placed the order because I found the same item for less at a different retailer). Today on Thursday, I just got charged on my CC and the item is in route for delivery.UPDATE: just got off the phone with customer service for the 2nd time and they basically told me the same thing, that it would get canceled. I'll wait and see.

Review.Titre: Verified, not verified
Review.Contenu: I created an online order on 12/11/23. Invoice stated that the order would be available for pickup at ‘will call’ on 12/13/23. Called ‘will call’ on 12/13/23 to verify that order was ready for pickup. Was told that (2) of the (3) products were ready for pickup and third item was in transit to location and that I could come pickup the (2) items that were available. Arrived at ‘will call’, they verified my ID and order number and said they’d be out with the products shortly. 30-40 minutes after that, I was informed that they were unable to locate any of the products and it could be weeks before they could get replacements in. This is when I chose to cancel the order . The purpose of calling ahead was to avoid such an instance to occur. Now I’m without product and wasted an afternoon for nothing.

Review.Titre: Delivery guy was rude
Review.Contenu: The delivery guy was rude had absolutely no manners. I believe his name was Brian Ochoa ? I can’t remember but I’m sure if they look up the time and date my order was delivered they’ll see it. I definitely don’t want his taller partner getting in trouble since he was the most polite.…  I got my Mom a washer here for Christmas as a gift I had it delivered I wanted her to have the full experience (instead of her or my dad installing it or picking it up) my mom greeted this short grinch politely and he looked bothered he even had to do his job to bring the washer down and pick up the old one. My mom was very uncomfortable in her own home that’s unacceptable. He’s been working for rcwilly for years, obviously RCWilly doesn’t give a rats ass about the customer service because I’m sure I’m not the only person who has complained about his attitude. If you don’t like your job get a new one. I will say that his partner on the other hand was polite and very kind and did most of the work he installed and uninstalled the washer and his responses weren’t rude or annoyed.

Review.Titre: Dont trust available for pickup
Review.Contenu: Don’t say you have an item available for pickup and the after the purchase send an email that it isn’t available we’ll let you know. May have made a different purchase or no purchase at all depending on availability.

Review.Titre: Waiting
Review.Contenu: Online order is not available as originally stated. And no word as to when the item will be available.

Review.Titre: Customer service did a great job to fix…
Review.Contenu: Customer service did a great job to fix the issue. Customer service five star. But experiences with online purchases using rewards points was bad. Need to be fixed for future.

Review.Titre: I ordered a new appliance online
Review.Contenu: I ordered a new appliance online, a dishwasher with the install kit plus the five year warranty. Upon completing the order online, there was no option to request the pickup of my old dishwasher appliance, nor an option to select an install for my new appliance. Hence I assumed both of these things would be completed automatically. Yet upon having the new appliance delivered to my home the delivery person wouldn't take the old appliance, they wouldn't complete the install of my new appliance. The delivery person wouldn't even bring the new appliance in to my home, they left it on the front porch! I called your Customer Service number only to have the customer service representative want to push me to a sales representative. During the call the customer service representative explained to me that I needed to request to have the old appliance taken even though there isn't an option online to do so! They then explained that I needed to request to have a third party complete the install, yet again I didn't see an option explaining that via your website. Overall this whole experience has been the worst I've ever had dealing with a major purchase of an appliance or furniture. My spouse and I over the years have purchased many items from your stores, including multiple couches, dining room tables, electronics, etc. I will never again shop with RC Willey having gone through this most recent dismal and upsetting experience!

Review.Titre: Bought a piece of furniture from these…
Review.Contenu: Bought a piece of furniture from these folks for a little over $3000. It was delivered when we were away. Wasn't used for 5 months - we've sat in it for six weeks and the cushions are collapsing. Supposedly it was under warranty but the manufacturer apparently says this is normal wear and tear. Even the technician RC Willey sent out took one look at it and said ' That's not right'. RC Willey refused to take any responsibility for selling substandard goods - refused any kind of recompense at all. Will NEVER use them again and will advise all my Park City friends to do the same.

Review.Titre: Repair Scheduling Nightmare
Review.Contenu: Repair service scheduling is absolutely not customer oriented! To get a chair repaired that is still under warranty,  we had to pay an $89 fee at least 2 days in advance, which no one bothered to tell me when I made an appointment. Didn't find out until I had to change the appointment.  They won't give you any idea what time they're coming until the night before,  which means you have to make sure you have an entire day with nothing else to do but wait for them to come.  Add to that the fact that the repair people don't work Thursdays and Fridays and we had to schedule 3 weeks out. And we're retired-- what do people with jobs do? Terrible policy and we'll definitely think more than twice before shopping there again!

Review.Titre: Worst customer service in appliance…
Review.Contenu: Worst customer service in appliance department we went in at 6:45pm and no one would help us. Four  guys were talking and playing digital arcade games about 20 feet from where we were standing and never even looked up at us.  We spent about 30 minutes finding what we wanted before My wife had to make noises for about 15 minutes just to get someones attention.  Finally someone asked if we needed help.  We had 3 appliances picked out so it was an easy sale.  This happens everytime we go into this department and eletronics.  We shouldn't have to seekout someone to sell us something.

Review.Titre: I ordered a game for the Nintendo…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a game for the Nintendo switch for in store pick up. Then received a message saying the order isn't ready. Email stating they would look into the issue and reach out. It's a drive from one side of the city to the other. I'm heading there in person to see if the game is sitting on the shelf. This is the second time this has happened. The first was with a xbox series x. Ordered one online, said it would be ready by a certain time. Drove across the city and then it wasn't ready. Said it would be a few days. I walked in and there was one on the shelf. I'm heading there to see if this is laziness or if the store is actually out of them.

Review.Titre: BAD DELIVERY DRIVERS
Review.Contenu: When they delivered my washer and dryer, for one they wouldn't hook up the gas line to my dryer, then they wouldn't hook up the waterlines to my washer.  I already had 2 Pedda stools from my other washer and dryer that they refused to put my new washer and dryer on.  Then I had to ask them for all the paperwork that goes with my washer and dryer, the one kid said that it should be in the machine.  Usually the paperwork comes in a plastic bag on the outside of the machine in the box when it is brand new.  the thing that pissed me off the most is the mess that they left in my yard, like all the Styrofoam pieces and garbage from them ripping the boxes off my washer and dryer.  Such bullcrap.  I have never experienced this kind of customer service with R.C. Willey's.Very disappointed

Review.Titre: Not acknowledged
Review.Contenu: Not acknowledged Pick up an online order and when exciting associate asked is for receipt and no one else walking out, discrimination

Review.Titre: I was told that I would get an email…
Review.Contenu: I was told that I would get an email back because the lady obviously didn't want to stay on the phone with me. Never heard back...

Review.Titre: Delivery time window
Review.Contenu: I think RC Willey should offer customers the choice to choose a delivery window time. It's inconvenient at times for the customer to be on their time.

Review.Titre: Not again!!!!
Review.Contenu: I have had the absolute worst experience with this establishment. I ordered multiple items a washer and dryer with no issues, my fridge was delivered damaged. My table was not delivered, and no one had answers. I had to go and pick it up and assemble it on my own. Though I received a refund on the delivery I still do not feel that this company performed to adequate standards. I also notified the company last night that they not only delivered a broken fridge but a broken chair. I have missed 2 days of work just for deliveries.

Review.Titre: I purchased a new fridge on Wednesday…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a new fridge on Wednesday of this week. My salesperson was good about texting back and forth with me until the sale was made and now he won't respond, The link in the email to see the warranty document won't work. I texted him and he won't respond. I've called customer service twice and they verified the link isn't working and tried to connect me with the appliance manager but he is not available. The second CS agent said she left a message for him to call me but...I'm currently trying to chat with someone but still waiting for a response. It shouldn't be this hard to simply get a document sent to me.Another issue with me salesperson is that before I let him know I had made a decision, I had purchased the Blue Rewards on line. I have had this before. Well, the salesperson cancelled that order so he could add it to the invoice without asking me if that was ok to do. That is a clear manipulation without my permission. I'm assuming so he could get the credit for it. Thing is, I had already put his name on it anyway. Not ok with that.

Review.Titre: RC Willey Reno Store Receiving Error
Review.Contenu: The RC Willey pickup did not verify that the stainless steel fridge I ordered and the one I picked up were the same item. I got home with a black fridge. It was clearly marked black on top but had the wrong SKU on the side. Whoever received the fridge at the Reno location failed to do verify the correct item had been received. Online customer service did great they are making sure I get the correct fridge, but unfortunately not for two weeks.

Review.Titre: Not a fan of the website functionality
Review.Contenu: I tried ordering a freezer and after putting in all info and attempting to pay through PayPal, I got an error message on RC Willey’s site. I tried 3 more times and got the same message. Then in my email I see 3 emails from PayPal that I authorized 3 payments to RC Willey. I didnt get a confirmation email from RC Willey so I emailed them from the site. I never heard from them, and it’s been a few days. This was all on their mobile site so I tried the desktop site and a message said I had to wait 15 minutes to get a new code to login. It’s ridiculous to need a code to login to my account.

Review.Titre: A complete disaster and lack of basic service
Review.Contenu: No confirmation email nor an email when it was ready to pick up. ☹️. It was loaded into the back of the Jeep by a young man... Not a word was said about the HUMONGOUS HOLE in the box... When investigated when we got it home, it had a dent so large in the 1/4 metal of the back of the microwave that it was almost bent in half. WHY would RC Willey think that would be.. in any universe.. An acceptable purchase?  Most all of my RC Willey experiences have been stellar... This was horrible from the get go.

Review.Titre: Replying to the reply from our review
Review.Contenu: Replying to the reply from our review. What good to us is a night stand that won’t match our new bed. Business wise I don’t think your company has a clue to what good service is. Amazon returns everything you’re not happy with. Eventually you will go out of business due to poor customer care.

Review.Titre: Lots of problems with the website
Review.Contenu: Lots of problems with the website. First adding the item to the cart gave me an error, then paying gave me errors, then it failed to subtract the $25 discount for signing up for email offers… I had to contact customer service twice (I’m not new to online shopping) Now, that said, the gal I spoke with in Customer Service was very good at resolving both issues. But the website was terrible. Way too much hassle and wasted time.

Review.Titre: No help with issue after purchase
Review.Contenu: We purchased stainless steel kitchen appliances from RC Willey and paid extra for them to be coated with Pro Shine because we were told it would make the mainteinance easier.  Just the opposite happened.  It became impossible to get fingerprints, smudges, or anything else off with the special cleaner that had to be used.  To their credit, they did replace the coating, but now we have the same issue and they no longer carry Pro Shine.  I called to ask them to come out and just remove the coating, but was told they can't do anything.  Now I have thousands of dollars invested in appliances that look absolutely terrible because we paid extra for the Pro Shine treatment that they recommended.  Buyer beware if you have a problem that requires their assistance after your purchase.

Review.Titre: BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review.Contenu: I bought a Gray Leather Power Lift Recliner with Heat SKU: 111894816 Order 45877643 on 6/25/21 it is suppose to have a 3 year warranty I have been waiting on a part since March and today I get a text that the ETA to have repaired is Oct. I would not buy anything from them and I will not be going there anymore. Their customer service and parts department is TERIBLE AND BELOW PAR.THEY DON'T BELIVE IN TAKING CARE OF THEIR CUSTOMERS.

Review.Titre: Go to LazyBoy
Review.Contenu: On December 18, 2022 I wrote the 1 star review "Buyer Beware."  I received the boiler plate reply, "I am sorry for the problems with your sectional.  I have forwarded this to the service manager of the Elk Grove store to look into."Guess what?  They ignored you just like they ignored me!!    Poor quality and poor customer service.

Review.Titre: Ordered a Wolf dual fuel range
Review.Contenu: Ordered a Wolf dual fuel range.  They could not give an ETA for delivery and said to get the "Signature" same price, has everything Wolf has.  Well, actually the left side of the oven is smaller and is NOT self cleaning.  Neither salesman nor manager will not return my calls.Edit: they say “ contact us” but really nothing there besides to contact for “ internet orders”

Review.Titre: Website experience
Review.Contenu: Cancelled an order, it’s been weeks, still not fully cancelled. Made an order online, been days, still sitting in limbo and not processed. So what’s the point of a website if it doesn’t work right. Also had to call web service for help with the order because it wouldn’t go through online. I expect better from you.

Review.Titre: Beware Ordering Online
Review.Contenu: When we ordered the items, we were told they were in stock. They weren’t and were shipped from the main retailer which sells the couches cheaper. We bought 2 couches, a bed frame, and a washer dryer. The couches were delayed for delivery and bed frame showed up but as we paid for delivery into our home, it was left on our porch. Nothing has gone as we requested on the delivery information which has made scheduling difficult. Carrying 100+ pound packages by yourself isn’t fun either. The whole experience has put a bad taste towards RC Willey for us.

Review.Titre: I bought a bunch of furniture from you
Review.Contenu: I bought a bunch of furniture from you, of the many items the base to a hutch had to be rejected and replaced 3 times, the 3rd time you guys told me its been discontinued and have to keep the damaged items. Then the dining room table I had for just over a year is warping and peeling and the wood is bubbling up, but you wont fix it because its just out of warranty.. 1000s of dollars for junk.

Review.Titre: Bought a sectional reclining couch
Review.Contenu: Bought a sectional reclining couch. Everyone including manager was very rude. Sales associate never mentioned about the warranty we could have bought. Couch defect. Loved RC Willey but will never buy from them again.

Review.Titre: Beware of Online Orders
Review.Contenu: Did not realize that online orders will not accept Blue Rewards. Reward was only $10, but CS wouldn't even apply as a courtesy. Also found out that even though I placed the order on Xmas Day, as advertised, I will NOT get the $50 gift card. Supposedly this $500+ item is an "exclusion". How are we supposed to know? I did NOT see any verbiage to that effect when placing the order. To add insult to injury, this order will not even allow a military discount. Terrible way to do business, especially around the holidays :(

Review.Titre: Very disappointed
Review.Contenu: Very disappointed. Given a non-useable coupon. They promise a $25 coupon for signing up for their newsletter and the coupon applies to the cart when using the code, but when you go to checkout, the total changes and removes the coupon. I called and was told the coupon doesn't apply to some items. The customer service representative confirmed that there's no notice or disclaimer on the coupon, the product, or even when you try to use it. Just an "well, sorry. That's just the way it is." Using these types of unusable incentives is not only underhanded, but it's also deceitful and intentionally misleading. I'll shop elsewhere from now on.

Review.Titre: Well the email I got said I can pick it…
Review.Contenu: Well the email I got said I can pick it up 11-11-23  i went to go pick it up but when i got there they told me that it’s not here it’s coming. From the Utah warehouse in a rude way

Review.Titre: …some assembly required
Review.Contenu: Went to will call to pick up a dinning room chair. Employee brought out an unassembled chair with parts and a box of hardware. There was no mention of this needing to be assembled on the website. Had I known this, I wouldn't have purchased it. If I wanted IKEA furniture I would have gone there instead.

Review.Titre: 3 times we’re ordered and they’re…
Review.Contenu: 3 times we’re ordered and they’re always have something reason like the warehouse too far in Utah or some damage when shipping….. and the last time they just canceled….. is unprofessional working with RC Willey.

Review.Titre: Be carful Web ordering needs to get better.
Review.Contenu: Web ordering needs to be better.I filled out the order using my husbands name and credit card. But AFTER submitting order, the web page substitute my name on the order. Why is that a problem? Because also only AFTER submitting the order did the website inform me that only I can pick the order at the store with ID. I am unable to do this. Next morning I spent some time with customer service via phone trying to get my husbands name added to pick up ,(many websites ask name of person picking up, but not RCW) after some hold time I was told to call later as the department was closed. This issue is wasting a lot of my time.

Review.Titre: It changed the name in the shipping…
Review.Contenu: It changed the name in the shipping address from what I had entered. The shipping address was a different name than the billing address. This is a very common situation. And now the wrong name is on the order because it changed it after the purchase button was clicked. Unintelligent.

Review.Titre: Why are you asking about my experience…
Review.Contenu: Why are you asking about my experience before I have had it? Waste of my time and yours. Fix you software to do the survey AFTER the product has been delivered.

Review.Titre: BUYER BEWARE Last Chapter I hope
Review.Contenu: I'll again reserve a star rating for the business but our salesperson Steven, deserves 5 plus stars.  He should be store manager.  Tomorrow 1/19/23  RC Willey is scheduled to deliver new furniture to replace the defective 6 piece leather sectional that started peeling color after 4 months.  Just be prepared if you have a quality issue regarding your purchase start at Salt Lake City and work west.

Review.Titre: Customer Service Failure
Review.Contenu: I ordered an over the range microwave and purchased the Blue Rewards as it clearly states on your website it would cover delivery and set-up. I’ve purchased several appliances from you and they have always been delivered and installed. Today we were told they don’t install microwaves. We would have just picked them up and not waited so long for the delivery. I called and spoke to Cole in Customer Service and he talked to his manager and told me we would be issued a $100 credit and the installation cost would be taken care of by RC Willey with no charge to us. Hours later I received a text from your customer service asking if I wanted to use the $100 credit towards the cost of the installation. I replied that we are not paying for the installation and asked them for a reply. I received no response. I hope your phone calls are recorded so you can listen to my call with Cole who then transferred me to salesperson Dave who wrote up the installation paperwork.

Review.Titre: Delivery men broke a window shade…
Review.Contenu: Delivery men broke a window shade during delivery and I have been unable to get someone out here to fix or replace the damage.  I spoke with someone at RC Willey over 2 weeks ago and they said they would send someone over to inspect the damage.  I am still waiting.  I pointed out the damage during delivery and he took a picture and said it would be in the report.  Very frustrating.

Review.Titre: Worst experience in appliance shopping…
Review.Contenu: Worst experience in appliance shopping I’ve ever experienced. All the salesman wanted to do was tell me how knowledgeable he was about appliances. He could have cared less about my questions or concerns. I told him this wasn’t working and I left. Never again!

Review.Titre: Online showed available in store but…
Review.Contenu: Online showed available in store but item wasn’t available.  Called to cancel the order since the item was not actually available and RC Willey has still not refunded the payment despite cancelling the order.

Review.Titre: Everything is expensive but cheaply…
Review.Contenu: Everything is expensive but cheaply made. When stuff goes out they don't fix it and if they do it's put back wrong. Recently had our washer go out. The guy to come repaire it (under warranty) did nothing but argue with me then left without fixing the issue.

Review.Titre: Terrible experience ordering online
Review.Contenu: Terrible experience ordering online. Item stated it was in stock and could be picked up same day, that was not the case. RC Willey refused to refund or allow cancellation of the order until two weeks later. So frustrating. I feel very taken advantage of by RC Willey.

Review.Titre: Advertised and confirmed purchase went…
Review.Contenu: Advertised and confirmed purchase went to go pick up my PS5  that said would be ready today but received notification that not in stock

Review.Titre: BUYER BEWARE continued
Review.Contenu: I will hold a better star rating in abeyance until the proposed resolution is fulfilled,  I first penned the complaint "BUYER BEWARE"about the 6 piece leather sectional that started color peeling at 6 months.  I just received a call from Liz at RC Willy.  She wanted to know how we could resolve my complaint. Not sure what prompted it; my review here, or the formal complaint to BBB, or the complaint to call Kurtis, or the  letter sent to the CEO in Salt Lake City.  I named my resolution:  RC Willy will fully credit the $4600.00 and we can select a new sectional with delivery and pickup of the old sectional.  One for the CONSUMER, I think?

Review.Titre: Don’t shop here
Review.Contenu: we bought something and got sent to the warehouse 30 mins away to only be told that the person helping us put in “transfer” so it would be sent to the showroom. Not being an employee of RC Willey I thought the warehouse would help us but they were rude and just told us to call our sales person. So drove back and asked for a refund and we’re told that the warehouse should have still pulled the items. Whole experience wasted our day and we drove out to this warehouse 40 mins each way for nothing.

Review.Titre: Purchasing a gift card--bad experience
Review.Contenu: We went in to the store to purchase a gift card.  My wife forgot her license at home, so they would not let us purchase one despite having other forms of ID.  We are out of town from Maryland, so it's not like we can get there easily.  I was able to purchase one online WITHOUT ANY OTHER FORM OF ID.  This was ridiculous.  I only bought the gift card from there because the person we are giving it to shops there.  We are moving to Utah in August and will need to purchase furniture for the entire house.  I guarantee that we will NOT purchase anything from RC Willey

Review.Titre: Shabby treatment
Review.Contenu: Got my boxed item home to find that RC Willey was expecting me to ASSEMBLE MY FURNITURE MYSELF. Noticed then that the receipt mentioned “minor assembly required” though no one mentioned that at the store. The instructions said 4 Steps—but because there are 56 separate pieces that was obviously not the case. I called RC Willey thinking this had to be a mistake, like maybe some customers get a discount if they volunteer to do their own assembly or something. Nope. Customer service confirmed that I was on my own.I expect this from IKEA but did not anticipate this shabby treatment from what I’d assumed was a higher-end store. What a shabby trick. Yes, of course I’ll be returning the merchandise, and yes, I’ll be sharing this review elsewhere online.

Review.Titre: I vowed never to buy from this…
Review.Contenu: I vowed never to buy from this establishment months ago after a debacle surrounding a major purchase of a sectional sofa.  Unfortunately the resolution left a credit on the books.  Having no desire to leave money on the table we decided to put it towards a dishwashe 4/18/23.  We paid for installation and the item arrived 4/25/2.  After about 60 minutes the installer said the washer was defective and he could do nothing more.  He picked up his tool box and walked out.  I assumed he would return with further explanation; wrong, he was long gone.  No dishwasher and the old one JenAir which still worked was gone in the back of his truck. Needless to say, I was not happy again.  After several angry telephone calls I was told the situation would be corrected,  Yesterday, they tried again.  So far the dishwasher does not leak and has not flipped a circuit breaker.  Never Again!!

Review.Titre: Tried to enter my discount for signing…
Review.Contenu: Tried to enter my discount for signing up for email notifications and it didn’t discount my order.Update to RC Willey's reply: I was shorted $15 on the adding email discount: You gave me $10 and it should be $25. I am pasting the words on your website: "Plus get a $25 coupon off your next purchase for first time sign ups."

Review.Titre: I ordered a couch
Review.Contenu: I ordered a couch. So I stopped shopping for one. Then the next day you sent me my fed ex tracking number for Saturday delivery. Super excited to get it for a family party. Then to get an email the next day that it never shipped and I could not even get it now. Missed some sales cuz of this

Review.Titre: This this sucksreview is just going to rip the RC…
Review.Contenu: This review is just going to rip the RC Wiley apart! We ordered an Amish bed. It was due to be delivered in a month. We actually got it delivered about 6 months later. It had gouges, and when they delivered it, it just seemed like they wanted to get out of there before we could find anything wrong. Well about 4 months after we received the bed & nightstand my daughter sat on the bed, & it broke. My first reaction was it must have been the Chinese amish that made the bed because the amish take pride in their products. Well after about a month they sent a guy out to evaluate the situation, he totally agreed with us, and he was sorry for our inconvenience. Once he sent the report in, along with the pictures he took. The management contacted us with the decision they would give us a credit for the bed, but they would charge us with a 25% restocking fee for the night stand. In my opinion they should have given us a full cash refund , for everything. The given us a $500.00 credit for our inconvenience. My wife and I have spent thousands of dollars there over the last 40 years. We will never shop there again.

Review.Titre: Missing pieces to set
Review.Contenu: the setup package was missing one of the critical screws to put together, with no spare given for it. I now have to go to the home improvement store and spend more of my money, to hopefully be able to find the screw needed to finish this end table. Manufacturing mistakes happen but this is why you always include at least one spare of each screw in your packaging, a simply lazy mistake to make.

Review.Titre: The merchandise we purchased was of low…
Review.Contenu: The merchandise we purchased was of low quality.We purchased a couch and love seat in June 2022. When they were delivered, the couch had a seat cushion that was shorter than the other two. The love seat had multiple flaws and they replaced it. When we got the second love seat it too was flawed, in that the back cushions didn’t have enough foamThe customer service people were responsive, but the manufacturer didn’t replace the seat nor the foam. Finally we settled on a monetary settlement (December 23, 2022) to get a new cushion and foam elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Couches lasted less than 4 months
Review.Contenu: We bought two sofas in April. By May we could tell they were prematurely pilling, and by September we had a rep come out and look at them. They took a bunch of pictures and agreed that they are falling apart. The cushions are losing their umph, they are pilling all over, and there are strings coming out of the fabric. They offered us a replacement. We don’t want another set of a couch that is falling apart. They said they can only offer store credit, so I spent three hours wandering the store trying to find another set that met my criteria. I came away frustrated and empty handed.  I don’t want store credit, I just want a refund and to be done. I paid $2100 for couches, and they lasted less than 4 months. NOT happy. I can understand the policy if I had just changed my mind, or if it had been a few years and the couches didn’t fully last through warranty. It’s been four months, the product failed. A full refund should be standard.

Review.Titre: I have a duplicate order placed that I…
Review.Contenu: I have a duplicate order placed that I had reached out just after the order was placed to have canceled but it appears days later after no communication to have never been canceled and was charged to my credit card. I’ve filled out the online customer service communication twice now and never heard back from anybody yet

Review.Titre: Lack of different bed sizes
I thought RC Willey was a reputable…
Review.Contenu: I thought RC Willey was a reputable business, which is why I spent over $ 3,000 on a desk for my den. I am shocked about the absolutely Horrible  customer service I am receiving. My desk was suppose to be delivered Aug 3rd but there someone pulled the wrong desk. New date was Aug 10th. Now they say the correct desk was pulled but the wrong hutch. My new date is suppose to be the 17th. I called to get it sooner because I am leaving town the 17th. I was told they would call me back by 7pm and no call from customer service. This is ridiculous!!!

Review.Titre: Their extended warranty is a LIE
Review.Contenu: Paid for an extended warranty on my couches. Trying to get a service appointment to get them cleaned and getting nothing but pushback to set this up. No online availability, you have to call in to schedule service, and their wait times are 20+ minutes. Online "customer service" is just a blocker, they don't try to help in any way. Definitely not a company that is up with the times!I've requested a refund for these warranties since it appears they don't intend to honor the warranties, and yet again, pushback from them. RC Willey is not an honest company. I will not set foot in their stores ever again.

Review.Titre: So mad! :{
Review.Contenu: I though buying something on clearance would mean they still wrap it and protect it for delivery. NOPE! And a white mattress at that! The salesman told us it would be in plastic too. So dirty on the top corners and there wasn't a spot on it at the store! So incredibly mad!! Who in their right mind would not cover that and just throw it in a delivery truck??? Fire them!! Unbelievable! (The delivery guy said it was not his decision.) It cost $1300 too! Not like a couple hundred bucks! I WOULD HAVE PICKED IT UP MYSELF HAD I KNOWN!!! Never again will I shop there!

Review.Titre: This was terrible across the board
Review.Contenu: This was terrible across the board.  I spoke to four different people in order to set up my brother to pick up my order and I was assured there would be no problems. Not only was he unable to pick up my order but they were incredibly rude to him and said the order would be cancelled. I tried that day to resolve the issues but was told I had to wait for loss prevention to review. Two days later LP reached out to confirm my brother was to pick up my order. I returned his call and still haven’t heard back. I still don’t know if the order is cancelled. Everyone wants to pass the buck and make no effort to reach a solution. Whatever happened to customer service?

Review.Titre: Delivery Is awful
Review.Contenu: I have always been loyal to RCWilley but my last few experiences have caused me to rethink my loyalty to this company.  My experience today pretty much has made my think that the next time I make a purchase I will use another company.  I ordered a bedroom set several weeks ago and it was supposed to be delivered today by 3:45.  I received a call 2 hours later that I would not be getting my delivery today after all and I would have to reschedule.  ThIs is unacceptable. I scheduled this delivery weeks ago and now have to wait longer.  RC Willey’s delivery department is awful. They need to be more realistic with there scheduling. They are always late unless you are early in the day and then cancelled at the last minute. Unbelievable.  My last delivery was not much better. The delivery man refused to put my sectional together claiming they don’t do that on carpet.  I let that one slide but now I am convinced it is time to try another company for my future purchases

Review.Titre: Unproductive card verification process
Review.Contenu: I had an overall positive experience up until when I arrived at the distribution center to pick up the order.  I did not have my wife's credit card in my possession so I was asked to call a help line to have my wife verify her card and purchase.  After spending over 15 minutes on hold, we each spoke to someone that was completely unable to assist us.  Through 20 minutes of frustration and no resolve, we canceled the original purchase using my wife's card.  Instead we used my debit card in my possession to prevent having another long, possibly unproductive conversation.  My wife and I considered canceling the entire purchase over the matter.

Review.Titre: Item was delivered damaged
Review.Contenu: Item was delivered damaged. Driver told me that customer service would contact me but never heard from anyone.

Review.Titre: Crappy Craftsmanship and Product
Review.Contenu: The manufacturing process of the desk that I received was completely butchered. The measurements of the pre-drilled holes for assembly were off by more than a half inch, the slide brackets for the drawers were damaged, and the customer service staff were unhelpful. When questioned about the desk and its issues, they stated it was customer error and to disassemble and redo the process. Personally, I had redone the process twice before contracting a professional to fix the wretched thing. They had stated that it was a super cheap product and the measurements were completely off. There is only a 14 day return policy, too bad it took so long to determine the absolute poor quality of this product.

Review.Titre: Special order living room set
Review.Contenu: We purchased a special order living room set. Within a month the recliners were sent back as the phone chargers weren’t working. Second time they came out to resting all pieces  third time they came out because the recliners are leaning. The ordered new pieces 3 months ago. I’ve had to keep calling to find out what’s going on. They tell me back ordered. Last week I called and they said they had the cushions I asked if they could install those today the guy arrived with only 1. He said 2 were ordered. So I called the store once again they are reordering. Not happy and NOT COMFORTABLE

Review.Titre: Forgot the to bring the power cords
Review.Contenu: Forgot the to bring the power cords. Told us that we would get a call from the warehouse.  We be e got the call after 3 days of calling ourselves they finally agreed to send.  It took another week to get the cords. We coildnt use our recliners for over a week. Unacceptable

Review.Titre: Beware ordering online
Review.Contenu: When we ordered the items, we were told they were in stock. They weren’t and were shipped from the main retailer which sells the couches cheaper. We bought 2 couches, a bed frame, and a washer dryer. The couches were delayed for delivery and bed frame showed up but as we paid for delivery into our home, it was left on our porch. It has put a bad taste towards RC Willey for us.

Review.Titre: Will NEVER buy from again
Review.Contenu: Will NEVER buy from again. I bought a whirlpool washer & dryer it worked for 2 weeks and started smelling like it was going to start on fire. I got the run around from EVERYONE at RC Willey and Whirlpool for 2 weeks. Still have a brand new under warranty broken washer. NOT IMPRESSED. I would give it 0 starts but that wasn’t an option.

Review.Titre: I havent even recieved my item yet
Review.Contenu: I havent even recieved my item yet... however you had already sent me a survey asking for a review of said items....

Review.Titre: I felt discriminated
Review.Contenu: For some reason, associates at the “cashier” don’t take you serious and really try to help you. I’m not sure if it was cause of age discrimination but they really seem too look down on you and try to talk to you like your dumb. Not trying to use the race card because I’m Latino. I am a proud American Army veteran but it really seems like none of those people really wanted to pay attention to me and my fiancé as if we didn’t have money. instead we were brushed off and looked at by associates at the cashier listening in on my conversation with an associate trying to assist me “she had a horrible attitude” with my order and staring and giggling amongst each other playing on the phone, instead of working. Never want to come here again.

Review.Titre: It was delivered to the wrong address
Review.Contenu: It was delivered to the wrong address. The people unboxed it then call you guys to tell you it wasn’t there. Then it was delivered without a box and any of the paperwork. I either want the paperwork or another fridge that’s in the box unopened.

Review.Titre: Clueless cashier
Review.Contenu: Bought a fridge on Memorial Day, rcwilley couldn’t order it from the manufacturer, I had to reorder it through the website. Took over 1 hour to get refund!

Review.Titre: I bought a washer and dryer with a 10…
Review.Contenu: I bought a washer and dryer with a 10 year warranty my washer broke down in August and they now only 6 years old. They want me to sign up for a monthly service and pay also  for the part and the time for the service man to come out, it has a 10-year warranty for it needs and it needs  to be fix, that's why i purchased these because of the brand and the warranty come on RC Willey that is false advertising.

Review.Titre: They did not put the bed together it’s…
Review.Contenu: They did not put the bed together it’s still not I received bed on 3/8/2023. I didn’t understand why it wasn’t put together I am callin tomorrow to the store to see what happened.

Review.Titre: Purchase price did not include my…
Review.Contenu: Purchase price did not include my discount in the price charged. It was shown on the breakdown but not subtracted from my balance due. The website also said I would confirm my purchase on the RCwilley website after confirming order on paypal site, that it would not process payment until I confirmed with RCwilley, it did not give me an option to confirm the order, it automatically submitted my order.

Review.Titre: I was told the other two items on the…
Review.Contenu: I was told the other two items on the order were at the Reno location for pick up. This is after I record an email stating the items would be ready for pick up next day even though online at check out said it was shipping to me directly. It was verified by the online order team and the pick up dept. When we arrived the headboard and platform bed were not there. They had no idea about the order. They figured out the items were being shipped to their location not me. They had to cancel the order and reorder with it shipping to me. The last purchases we’ve had over two years have all been terrible and this is the last order we will make with RC Willey. Disappointed because I’ve been a customer since 2011.

Review.Titre: We ordered a tv console
Review.Contenu: We ordered a tv console.  The online order experience was just fine.   Our box was delivered while we were out.  I would have refused delivery if I had been here.   The box was left on the porch completely torn open and coming apart.   Of course there is really no way of knowing at what point the damage happened.  We had to carry it in piece by piece.  It was such a mess.  I would not order again just because of the terrible delivery.

Review.Titre: I ordered a kitchen aide cook top on…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a kitchen aide cook top on August 22nd and the range arrived several weeks later minus three burners!  After repeated phone calls and trips to RCWILLEY’S the missing burners arrived at the store on November 17th!   I installed them myself using FaceTime with guidance from the installer!  Now RCWILLEY is charging me $105 in late fees and interest!  I discovered could have ordered the same thing from Best Buy with no hassle. The customer service department is terrible!  They were no help!  My house is in escrow and I was scared the house wouldn’t close because the burners didn’t work. When I complained about being charged interest on inoperable cook top, I was told that interest starts accruing as soon as part of the item is delivered. My advice go somewhere else!

Review.Titre: I wanted to add installation to my…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to add installation to my order and called in, long wait times, call transferred many times and then someone was going to call me back to help me and never did. Issue is still not resolved. I need to work up my courage to try to deal with it today.

Review.Titre: No communication
Review.Contenu: No communication. Placed order over 5 days ago and still no tracking number. Called customer service, sat on hold for a very long time. They said my item was being drop shipped so they will need to get back to me after they reach that dept. Still no update!!!!!

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Service and Communication
Review.Contenu: Was given gift cards as a gift. They are supposed to be activated 24-48 hours after purchase. They weren't. We went to the store multiple times and got reassured that give it a couple more days. Still nothing. Went back 3 days later and customer service was no help. Explained the situation multiple times and she was confused. The person who helped us walked away with other workers, making the whole situation feel like they screwed up and things were very concerning. We called the corporate office and it just needed to be approved. It took 1 week to use gift cards that were already purchased, not to mention these gift cards were high value. This store is not budget friendly, has items priced way more than what they are worth. Don't recommend purchasing from them.

Review.Titre: Damaged Microwave Oven
Review.Contenu: The microwave oven we ordered arrived damaged.  It was dented two places in the back. It was bent somehow, so that it does not lay evenly on the counter top.

Review.Titre: Not worth it, take your money somewhere else!
Review.Contenu: I wish we could give 5 stars, but our experience was actually terrible.  It started off great, we got sold a beautiful couch.  It was down hill from there and I mean WAY down hill.  We arranged to pick-up the couch (as we live 4 hours away).  We had a family function that morning, so we arrived 20 minutes before RC Willey opened, we had called the day before and said we were going to be there first thing and they said they'd have it ready.  It took us almost 2 hours to get our stuff, and we ended up missing part of the family function and they delayed it as long as they could for us.  The gal at the Layton Will Call was about as rude as I've ever experienced which was off putting as we'd just spent over $6k on this sectional. We took a trailer because it was a very large sectional with 6 pieces plus an ottoman.  We got home only to discover the largest corner piece was for an entirely different sectional, different color, shape, size.  RC Willey did end up sending a couple of guys up to exchange it.  Then we had 2 of the sectional pieces break in the same spot along the frames (they are just poorly built, with boards too small to support the span of the large sections.)  They ended up sending out a repair guy to fix the sectionals and ended up just replacing them altogether, but the replacement literally took months.  The replacement took place over two different trips because they didn't have one of the replacement pieces with them.  On the second trip, the poor drivers sat in our driveway for over 8 hours because their truck broke down and it took that long for RC Willey to send help.  I wish we could say better things, our sales person and his manager tried to be helpful, but at the end of the day it was enough for us to decide that we will never buy anything from RC Willey again.  It is worth noting that the sectional is no longer available and has since received horrible reviews, so at least we know we're not alone in our struggle.

Review.Titre: Was told my delivery would be between…
Review.Contenu: Was told my delivery would be between 11am and 1pm. Now it appears it won't be here till between 5:10pm and 5:40pm. Called customer service and they told me it should be here at the earlier time but when I tracked my order it is still saying the later time. No one seems to know or can help me. I had made arrangements to be here and have no idea when my order will be delivered. I am very busy and don't time to sit here all day wondering when my order will arrive. Not very happy. Kevin

Review.Titre: I will never do business with RC Willey…
Review.Contenu: I will never do business with RC Willey again. The gimmicky sales and deceptive "customer service" practices are appalling.

Review.Titre: POOR DELIVERY AND COMMS
Review.Contenu: 5/19 I purchased a JBL Flip 6 with a pick-up delivery date of 5/20. I received an email on 5/20 saying I wasn't going to be able to pick it up as promised & that was it. No idea what's going on. Just waiting.

Review.Titre: Third Party Vendor/Installer
Review.Contenu: I purchased a dishwasher last year June 2022, and this June 2023 I went to open the dishwasher door and the door latch was obstructed but nothing I could see visually that would prevent the door to close. Thank Goodness I purchased the extended warranty at the time of original purchase coz I needed to file a claim and get this repaired etc.Long story short, the appliance repair service guy came out took one look at the dishwasher told me I am not touching this dishwasher, he said it was jerryrigged, took pictures and said you need to contact RC Wiley.So I did, long story short after nearly a month later we are finally on schedule for dishwasher exchange after I followed up with the extended warranty dept. The original installers are coming back to install the new dishwasher since they are considered the best, I requested the owner or lead guy to reinstall our dishwasher….This is all for my senior mother who is 81 with Alz who doesn’t have a clue all the leg work that I have had to do to get this completed when it should have been done right the 1st time!!!🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️ And why did the original installers Jerry rigg the dishwasher in the 1st place. Yes I am nervous about the reinstall but what am I to do, we need our dishwasher, catch 22 Thanks RC Wiley what a circus

Review.Titre: website was terrible
Review.Contenu: website was terrible. I had to keep entering information, and I'm still not a registered purchaser.

Review.Titre: Worse customer service ever
I am LIVID and literally at my wits…
Review.Contenu: I am LIVID and literally at my wits end!! I purchased 4 brand new Frigidaire appliances for our rental home in July and the dishwasher has never worked. I have contacted RC Willey’s customer service innumerable times to see about getting a technician to come out and look at it and have continuously been told that they are waiting for an email response from the manufacture before they can send somebody out to look at it. They say they’ve sent 4 emails and no response from the manufacturer. So they are doing nothing to remedy this situation. Meanwhile, the house has been rented and the new tenants have not had a dishwasher in over two months. Are you serious? This is absolutely ridiculous and I will NEVER purchase another thing from this company ever again after this. Absolute HORRIBLE customer service!!!!!

Review.Titre: Place an order online for pick up the…
Review.Contenu: Place an order online for pick up the next day! Both items were available for next day pick up . But apparently they weren’t and there it is one ⭐️. Why would they promote this items if there not available when the customer is ready to make purchase for next day pick up ..

Review.Titre: Well I must say this store supervisor the rudest person I have met in this role
Review.Contenu: Well I must say this store supervisor (Taylor) had to the rudest person I have ever dealt with, especially in front of the 2 employees that were helping me pay. They lost a 7000.00 sale over 10.00.  I suppose that is the way they want to train future supervisors to handle a 10 dollar deal.  Dumbest thing I have ever seen.  Ot was over a dumb promotional item, she flat out refused to give a second item to my friend, she said one per family.  Well he is not family and I have 3 sales orders over the 2 days I spent in the store, on an average of 6 hours,  My time is valuable, but I suppose Taylor's time was more valuable.  Will never but anything not recommend this store to anyone. The rest of the staff was kind and helpful.  But one sour apple and ruin the while basket.  One more note I was there with a male friend. And he closely watched her movement and the evil stares thinking we were a gay couple, so I think that story is worth more than this post.  Im sure the LGBT community will enjoy this.

Review.Titre: This store stole my money!
Review.Contenu: This store stole my money!! Careful of thieves! They sold me a warranty but then told me it was a 3rd party warranty that they misrepresented and would not honor. Lost nearly $1K in warranty’s from the thief’s at RC Willey

Review.Titre: I usually have a great experience
Review.Contenu: I usually have a great experience, but this time I had no communication on when my furniture would be delivered to the warehouse. The first time I called customer service they had to request it to be delivered from their Utah warehouse and told me I would have to keep calling to see when it was finally delivered.

Review.Titre: The delivery service was terrible
Review.Contenu: The delivery service was terrible. They came into the house without wiping their feet and tracked in mud. They were not helpful in answering my questions.

Review.Titre: No help with my situation.
Review.Contenu: Tried to buy new carpet. Was told I would have to tear out & haul away my old carpet. Ironically,  they sold & installed the carpet I'm replacing. And they had no problem tearing out & hauling away that time. Going to spend my money somewhere else.Of note :Yes, my carpet has dog pee. That's why I'm replacing it with pet friendly carpet. I disclosed this to the person who came to measure... first thing ! I know it's an extra charge and was willing to pay for it. I'm looking at a set of stairs, upper hall ( where the pee is ), full primary bedroom and primary on-suite. I can handle removing the hallway carpet but can't do all the rest. What really bothers me is there was no discussion of options, compromise, possible solutions... nothing ! If I hadn't asked Ginger about it she would have taken my money & ordered product without telling me they had no intention of tearing out ANY of the carpet. I love this store, have had a long relationship with them, and spent a lot of money over the years. Number one reason ? The amazing customer service I have always received. Until now...

Review.Titre: Poor Service and unhelpful product description
Review.Contenu: Maytag electric Dryer was delivered today. Does not come with a power cable. Was not aware that the purchase did not come with power cable. The only prompt that came up when I made the online purchase was to buy a gas line and vent. It did not prompt or suggest to purchase a power cable.  The driver was not helpful even after my wife offered to pay for installation. He said he couldn't help since the order was made online.

Review.Titre: Poor communication on order status
Review.Contenu: The ordering process was easy, however now I've been told my order isn't ready for pickup and I haven't received an update and have no idea what's going on with my order or items.

Review.Titre: Broke upon opening
Review.Contenu: Ordered our new dining room table and it was delivered. However when we opened the box to start assembling, one of the panels underneath came off and not just one but all four screws were so bent that it wasn’t even attached to the underside of the table. As well as one of the screws being broke and embedded into the table top.

Review.Titre: A 20% non-refundable charge
Review.Contenu: A 20% non-refundable charge (if returned) for a product “in stock” a few days ago and now a “special order”.    I’ll buy from Home Depot or Lowe’s. Simple no hassle return policy on the same product.

Review.Titre: Will call pickup email incorrext
Review.Contenu: Email stated the wrong hours of will call.... 7 rather than 8.  Pickup email also did not say that credit card was required for pickup. It only said ID was required. I sent my son 60 miles with my ID then he couldn't pickup so I had to then come.  Then when I got there with the credit card they didn't even ask to see it but only the last 4 digits. I suggest someone in operations look at all procedures with a critical eye. These are very basic and very important items that affect people's lives.

Review.Titre: Delivery was fine
Review.Contenu: Delivery was fine. But, I paid $99 for it. That was just to bring the appliance in the home, unbeknownst to me. They no longer install. I will go somewhere else next time, somewhere that installs. Somewhat useless really.

Review.Titre: Delivery damage to house and refrigerator.
Review.Contenu: Purchase went great.  Delivery damaged front door without saying anything.  Dropped the dolly with the refrigerator on my Walnut floors and did quite a bit of damage.  Very young installers in a hurry.  The $5000 refrigerator is now making horrible noises.  Claims and repair are responding but really such a huge hassle.  At least they should deliver a new refrigerator immediately.

Review.Titre: Late and wrong
Review.Contenu: So, had good experience purchasing a table but the delivery needs a lot of improvement.  It was rescheduled several times for the same day and then rescheduled for another day.  Then there were missing parts.  Oh, and by the way they deliver whenever.  You just need to wait until they get around to it.  If you can, pick it up yourself and save the money.

Review.Titre: Overall not great
Review.Contenu: Ordering and pick up was great. Your company failed when I open my new dishwasher and it didn’t have a door handle. I know very well this is not the distribution centers fault. However it’s the way it was handled that puts a bad taste in my mouth. I believe when a customer buys something and it’s missing parts that the store should step up and make it right. Instead I had to do all the leg work myself. I am not impressed how this was handled.

Review.Titre: Website needs updating
Review.Contenu: The username and password boxes, as well as the address entry boxes on the website were not working properly. I was able to place an order, but had to call customer service to correct the address afterwards.

Review.Titre: Miscommunication
Review.Contenu: I pulled into the pick-up area and followed the instructions for the text message check in. Half an hour or later I went into the building to see what was taking so long and it turns out they never saw my information. After checking in it only took about five minutes to get my item. The people I worked with were great and very nice. I'm just disappointed that it took so long.

Review.Titre: 3rd party delivery service
Review.Contenu: They outsource delivery and the service they provide is below standards!! I only gave an extra star because the sales people and customer service in person and on the phone is superb, however their delivery service is horrible!! The men who came to my elderly parents’ home to deliver a bed that my disabled mom was in desperate need of due to mobility issues were callous, heartless, rude, mean, and combative!! My mother is disabled and sick and my father is 83 years old. The delivery service was so terrible and even told us to just cancel our order, they don’t care…. Appalling!!! Left my mom in tears and so shaky she ended up having another fall from being so weak a few hours later.We ended up buying a bed and an adjustable bed frame that was way out of her budget, but Ralph was so great and we needed the bed ASAP (again, due to mobility issues). I feel bad for these hard working sales people for the delivery service to leave such a sour taste!! Another thing Ralph did that I thought earned an extra star was text us afterwards to apologize, but it wasn’t his fault. They really need to hire trained delivery people on customer service. Do not accept anything or sign for any delivery otherwise returning your product will be hell!! Thank goodness we dodged that bullet when the delivery service refused to help my parents remove their old furniture.Don’t waste your time here, go to Living Spaces! They have updated styles and their employees don’t work on commission. Living Spaces won’t sell you anything you don’t need and their delivery service is top notch! You don’t have to move a thing or prep for their arrival. Sorry, not sorry, but we will never give RC Wiley our business again. Wish we asked around or read reviews before going there. Almost all of my friends agree how horrible it is and I’ll help spread the word as well.

Review.Titre: ordered a computer for my…
Review.Contenu: ordered a computer for my granddaughter. it came in on time but had a hole in the box that looked like a forklift tine went through it. I was told they had no more in stock and we had 14 days to return it. I am nervous because she is returning home to florida in 2 days and if something goes wrong I wont be able to help. I am sure they could have gotten another one in before she leaves but did not offer to do so

Review.Titre: Driver just wanted to leave our new &…
Review.Contenu: Driver just wanted to leave our new & heavy PacMan machine at the front door  ... my husband asked for his help to bring it in.  Driver said only if you help me. So it's in a box & we have no idea on how to put it together.  Never had this happen from RC Willy.

Review.Titre: The return was simple
Review.Contenu: The return was simple, but wife was offered no assistance carrying the lamp to customer service. Then when she got there, she asked the teller to use the balance of the rewards certificate towards the new purchase. It wasn't done.I then received a response from R.C. Willey saying the credits were applied, but totally misrepresented the original concern. I knew they gave the credit from the return, but the balance of the rewards certificate used in the original purchase was NOT applied to the new purchase. The response prompted lowering the overall rating from three to two stars.

Review.Titre: Ordered a microwave from the Rocklin…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a microwave from the Rocklin store online and then learned I had to drive all the way to Sacramento to pick it up (not Rocklin).  I ended up cancelling order and ordered the same one from Best buy at a better price and had it delivered in two days.

Review.Titre: ORDER "pending"
Review.Contenu: AFTER I purchased the items online, I received a notice that the order was "pending".  At no time, prior to purchase was I advised that the items were "not in stock" at the Henderson RC Willey store.  I called the store and was told the items were being shipped to the store and had not arrived.  When will this order be ready for pickup???????

Review.Titre: Horrible warranty service
Review.Contenu: Great prices, but heaven forbid there is something wrong with your item good luck!  My electronic recliner stopped working with one side stuck up, It's been over a month and still nothing, went into the store several weeks ago they said i was on schedule for 16, 17, 18  well those dates came and went. Nobody calls and today was told it not worth it for them to come up.  Never again will I buy from this company that has a total lack of customer service.

Review.Titre: Online shopping experience not for me
Review.Contenu: Let me preface with the fact that I love working with RC Willey stores. This is specifically my experience with ordering online. I ended up needing to call RC Willey to complete my order with a person which then made it so I needed to change my payment method from my PayPal Credit account to my regular checking account.  I think in the future, I’ll skip the “convenience “ and just work with the actual people.

Review.Titre: The website and purchasing process felt…
Review.Contenu: The website and purchasing process felt like a bait and switch by accepting welcome coupon and then not including in final purchase price. Thankfully, the transaction was finally resolved by making calls to service. Very frustrating experience.

Review.Titre: Always helpful friendly staff, but door greater issues
Review.Contenu: Always helpful friendly staff, however the door greeters, Last one I dealt with anyways)  was not so great, picked up in store a few ps5 games and a controller and upon walking out they said they needed to record the codes of the games to make sure they get charged, (I already paid) anyways I let them take the info, after 20 mins I was really pissed, you have a greater that is very slow and hand hardly see let alone write down stuff to record stuff. Ended up taking a picture and sent it to her so I could leave. If this is a new policy please provide them with a scanner to make it quick seamless. it took me less time to find my games I wanted and pay for them than it did with her.

Review.Titre: Unable to apply for credit online due…
Review.Contenu: Unable to apply for credit online due to distant past credit issue.  Even your credit department was unable to override this issue.  If something is no longer reportable on credit report, should be removed on your side as well. This is not something on my credit history.  This is a flag on my old account at RCWilley

Review.Titre: Not really of price comparison matching.
Review.Contenu: The fact that they offered so many hp products, but they would not satisfy a particular model when it itself was the same thing, a touch screen that best buy was advertising for $180.00 less!!! The only reason I bought a cheaper hp product instead of an apple was the price and convenience. If I had my way I would still have gotten an apple 12.9 through someone else instead due to Apple having "virus" protection already free or built in! I have pictures of it!!! I still put it to 2!!! Send me a way to send those to you and I will do so!!!

Review.Titre: Horrendous problems with delivery
Review.Contenu: This 2 stars is kind of an average. Our salespeople (Mike and Karen) and the office staff were great, especially since it took us a couple of tries to find the right couch. But delivery (and this is paying for the high end/white glove delivery service) has been a nightmare. We finally settled on a couch created from 2 very wide recliners, and this is our first experience with a motorized recliner. This is not a budget couch, and it's not like they haven't made money from this purchase. The problem arose when the delivery was made and it turned out that one of the motors would not work. We planned for a second try just to replace the side that was broken. This was another 3 day wait. What happened here? They brought the wrong part (ie, they brought a second of the side that was working just fine). We tried to call to see if we could do something that wouldn't necessitate us going to the back of the line in terms of delivery date. My husband called and got on the call back list (where they call you so you don't have to wait on the phone). 7 hours later, they haven't called. Tried again and was told to call Karen, who wasn't working that day and said she couldn't help us. Tried again, got bounced around a bit and finally just had to be happy with another 3-4 day wait. This is totally unacceptable but we were so sick of trying to get this problem fixed we gave up for the day. It's not like they're the DI. Price was decently into the 4 figures. After they made mistakes twice with delivery, it's really on them to expedite getting our couch to us in working order. Gee whiz, offer us our delivery fee back or, better, don't make us wait another 3-4 days for our couch. Show us you're being accountable and value our business. Really angry

Review.Titre: delivery people
Review.Contenu: My delivery people. The first thing he said at my door was “you didn’t order a cord so we can’t install them so would you like us to just put them in the garage?” I told him I paid the the service so no I want it upstairs where it belongs. He grudgingly said well we can’t connect it. You’re delivery service needs to be the five star just like you expect the people in store to be. Also rcwilley knows that people forget to order those cords so they should have a supply of them to sell on their trucks.

Review.Titre: I wanted to order 2 recliners but they…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to order 2 recliners but they aren’t available in local warehouse and RCWilley didn’t not offer to bring them. I was given the option of store pickup in Roseville

Review.Titre: I expect more from economic Wiley
Review.Contenu: I expect more from economic Wiley. If I wanted pressed particle board to show up at my house in a bust box and to spend over three hours building furniture… I would have bought the dresser at ikea or on Amazon.

Review.Titre: We purchased a bed
Review.Contenu: We purchased a bed, mattress and dresser from the Rocklin store. Upon arrival, we only received the dresser because the headboard and footboard were damaged. Neither the delivery guys or the customer service rep I spoke to really cared that I was about to be extremely inconvenienced with the fact that we had no bed. Upon arrival of the bed, 5 days later, as the delivery guys were putting the bed together , they asked if we had a benkie board. I had no idea what that was. Well it’s the foundation that goes under the mattress to keep the mattress from bending. Pretty important piece to the bed. Would have been nice to know that it didn’t come with so we could have purchased it and had it delivered with the bed. We had to purchase one after the bed was setup AND go pick it up ourselves. I don’t mind picking up our own items but the fact that we weren’t told really irritates me. They definitely need to inform and educate customers as to what is included. Customer reps need better phone customer service.

Review.Titre: Wrong refrigerator was delivered
Review.Contenu: Wrong refrigerator was delivered.  Ordered 33 inch and a 36 was delivered.  Very frustrating.  Delivery guys were polite but couldn’t resolve the issue in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Well Toni was great and tried to get me…
Review.Contenu: Well Toni was great and tried to get me set up good but ultimately the sectional came with only half the set and it was the wrong side also. So it was left so i have something and now waiting another week.

Review.Titre: Wrong information
Review.Contenu: Wrong information. Asked about an email saying my order not ready for pickup. I called and am told it’s ready. I went to the Summerlin store, told its not there, my order is in Salt Lake City. Duh!! That’s just ridiculous customer service.

Review.Titre: First the IRS now this.
Review.Contenu: The price on the item I wanted was $800 but every time I added it to my cart it increased by $100. That’s false advertising, so I had to buy it costing something it doesn’t say on the website. Very disappointed. Rc willey already has over priced items. When does it end?

Review.Titre: Was told there was an item in stock
Review.Contenu: Was told there was an item in stock, I place an online order for it shortly after, and later that day I went to pick it up and they said it was not in stock.

Review.Titre: Delivery time and scheduled dates on…
Review.Contenu: Delivery time and scheduled dates on our online purchase is in error and after multiple phone calls they still cant seem to fix this issue.

Review.Titre: Bad and sloppy installation of a Gas Dryer
Review.Contenu: As a furniture store I have no complaints.  It is the service and or outside company they use to delivery or install, i.e. appliances.  Just bought a gas dryer late last month.  Installers were young and I could see somewhat rushed.  I specifically told the chap that was attaching the dryer to make certain the vent hose was secure in the wall.  Two days ago I saw that it had come apart and away from the wall.  I was shocked and upset because I had used my dryer before noticing and I have no idea how long the hose had been like this.  We all know that using a gas dryer without a vent hose is not an option. If you operate a dryer without such a vent hose, moisture and lint can accumulate in the machine, potentially resulting in a fire. I was able to look at the hose and noticed that a ring is missing at the end of the hose that goes into wall.  Without this ring there is no way the hose will stay put.  I can only think the chap that was here was new and frankly had no idea on how to attach. THERE IS NO EXCUSE FOR THIS.  Impossible to do any laundry until corrected. I called immediately for service and was told nothing available for Saturday and Sunday and Monday the delivery/repair  company does not work.  Frankly, the inconvenience of this suggests strongly that I will never, ever purchase another appliance from R.C. Willey.  They need to address this and perhaps switch to a different outside company.

Review.Titre: I called layton to see if we could pick…
Review.Contenu: I called layton to see if we could pick up our washer today. They said it was at the south salt lake store and that I could just go pick it up without calling ahead. I decided to call ahead anyways after I found a babysitter and they had said it was not there so we couldn't go get it but it was on the way there. I said well if it's on its way there how am I supposed to pick it up at layton tomorrow? The story then changed again. And they didn't even know if I could pick it up in layton tomorrow.

Review.Titre: I paid for shipping but still got to…
Review.Contenu: I paid for shipping but still got to carry it to my basement but wayfair delivers to room of choice .  If they had this item, I would have bought it there instead

Review.Titre: Never received a called on how the…
Review.Contenu: Never received a called on how the delivery was and I item.  Item is damaged and delivery men told me they would call and I could discuss damage with them

Review.Titre: Definitely would not repeat
Review.Contenu: Ordered gift cards for Mothers Day - ordered two $500, because a single $1000 was not available.  No problem there.  The problem came where only one gift card was delivered -- to me, none to the recipient.  At least I was cc'd so I knew of the failure.  The automation for the email delivery to the recipient was incorrect - instead of, e.g. mom at yahew dot com, the email was e.g. mommom at yahew dot com.  Called customer support - explained the problem to them; they were clueless about even the problem.  Just said, "Oh no, you have to wait a day for them to be active."  I reexplained the issue to support -- I was put on hold while she "checked with the IT guys," then moments later assured me that, "You just have to wait."  Explained to her that I had already received the gift card but it was only one.  Why would one process in 18 seconds and one take 24 hours?  Well, 24 hours later, big surprise I don't have the second gift card and my mother never received an automated notification of even the one gift card.I try to support small business but (a) RC Willey is a big enough shop that this really shouldn't be happening in the first place, and (b) the customer service response was so unbelievably dismissive, I cannot see me ever shopping there again even for mom who loves the place.

Review.Titre: We will be canceling our furniture…
Review.Contenu: We will be canceling our furniture order today. I had a very frustrating experience shopping there. I understand that all the sales employees know me from previously being a supervisor there but I feel they took advantage of that. I trusted a sales person I knew from working there 3 years ago so I said hello to her and told her we wanted to shop for a sectional and a few other items. It was horrible. She was never anywhere to be found because she was helping so many other people. We were there way too unnecessarily long. When I finally found her she was rushing me, telling me the furniture manager was after her to hurry up with me because she needed to go help some elderly couple in dining. I no longer work there, and I am a paying customer. I should have gotten the same one on one experience anybody else walking through that store gets. Anyways, very disappointed! We went to Bob's furniture and found way better items and bought them. We will be canceling our furniture order of a little over 3,000 today. On a separate note. We also bought a washer and dryer from Josephine Santos. EXCELLENT SERVICE!!!! she never left our side and we picked out what we wanted and was in and out of there! We are keeping that purchase. Just wanted to let you know about our furniture experience. Thank you for reading this.

Review.Titre: Ordered $549 desk hutch files  you…
Review.Contenu: Ordered $549 desk hutch files  you won’t put it together because of it’s cheaper price.  I won’t buy.

Review.Titre: Furniture was damaged prior to delivery…
Review.Contenu: Furniture was damaged prior to delivery --- THIS IS Avoidable, and SHOULD HAVE been checked/caught/corrected PRIOR to delivery.

Review.Titre: Multiple issues
Review.Contenu: Website let me schedule my delivery first later that day.  Called the next business day as it didn't arrive  only to find they have no schedule to deliver.  At this time they tell me th soonest I can get it would be two days later.   Had I known I would have purchased it for cheaper somewhere else

Review.Titre: Bought a very expensive appliance the…
Review.Contenu: Bought a very expensive appliance the sales person had no idea about the product I had to go to a Roth show room to educate myself so I could tell him what I wanted, then he is charging a delivery fee even though we pay for blue advantage, I won’t shop here ever again

Review.Titre: It didn't work the first time I tried…
Review.Contenu: It didn't work the first time I tried ordering something. It did the next day. Also, it kept adding the same item twice to my cart.

Review.Titre: On the order it was quoted that we…
Review.Contenu: On the order it was quoted that we could pick it up on the 17th and it wasn’t there. They told us we had to come back the next day. We are 30-40 mins from your store. Pretty frustrating.

Review.Titre: Went to location on 256 S
Review.Contenu: Went to location on 256 S. 5600 W. Warehouse worker was leaning on my car he vaped in my face. Not that but got here at 3:15ish someone else showed up after me and his order was pulled first. When I checked in they didn’t tell me the time to expect and it was a video game. Little frustrating to me.

Review.Titre: Guy at will call great! Lady on phone not!
Review.Contenu: The guy who gave me the order was great and super nice! But when I pulled into a will call space and called the number the lady that answered sounded all rude. I purchased a dishwasher and bought the “deluxe” installation kit but got the basic. Then I never got the “free gift” included in my purchase that you get for spending a certain amount and I wasn’t driving back for a gift and the right kit from that rude lady on the phone.

Review.Titre: Purchased one of three bookcases and…
Review.Contenu: Purchased one of three bookcases and was told that other two on back-order due in October.  Signed up for email when it arrived.  Never heard and went on-line and found it available.  To pickup next week

Review.Titre: It was actually really difficult to use…
Review.Contenu: It was actually really difficult to use the email coupon code. I had to do it about 20 times. Then it was difficult to create an account, this too took about 20 attempts.

Review.Titre: Repackaged item with a damaged piece.
Review.Contenu: The item looks ok but the carton had water damage and one of the pieces is damaged.
