Looks like I was sent an item that was either damaged in warehouse or returned. for what we spent I would expect a better experience. If I wanted a piece of furniture with a distressed box and damage I would have gone to a clearance outlet. Shipping was fast though

Review.Titre: Delivery not available for piece of…
Review.Contenu: Delivery not available for piece of furniture, tried to order appliances online and it kept saying “available” and then when you go to order it, website says “back ordered.”  Signing in took multiple tries as the website kept resetting and resetting to California (I don’t know why, I’ve never bought anything in the state of California). The website is NOT user friendly. I ended up buying 3 appliances from Best Buy instead and still have to deal w the piece of furniture at RC.

Review.Titre: Even though I had a small purchase…
Review.Contenu: Even though I had a small purchase yesterday.  I noted from the greeter to the several sales associates I walked passed, not one person acknowledged my presence.  The only friendly conversation I had was with the cashier as I purchased my item.

Review.Titre: The website kept giving me an error…
Review.Contenu: The website kept giving me an error that I could only pick up product. Sales rep continuously worked too fast and made careless errors. It was a frustrating day of purchases.  I spent a lot of money and still can't get everything delivered.

Review.Titre: Gift Card never delivered
Review.Contenu: There was a $50 gift card as part of my order which I never received.

Review.Titre: LOVE MY ROCKER/RECLINER BUT !
Review.Contenu: LOVE MY ROCKER/RECLINER BUT !! THE DELIVERY PEOPLE "WILL NOT BRING IN YOUR HOUSE" !! IM DISABLED, SO IT HAD TO SIT OUTSIDE UNTIL MY HUSBAND CAME HOME. I EVEN ASK FOR THEM TO PUT THE BOX IN THE DOORWAY. ALL THEY WOULD DO IS POINT ON INVOICE WHERE IT SAY " PORCH/FRONT DOOR ONLY !! THAT INFO SHOULD BE IN BOLD PRINT NOT FINE PRINT. CYNTHIA /DENNIS HARKER

Review.Titre: Don’t do business with Lee Barney
Review.Contenu: 11/5/2022 Lee Barney helped us. The guy is a jerk and shouldn’t be in sales. Unacceptable!!!

Review.Titre: Poor information on deliveries
Review.Contenu: We poor information on appliances you ordered online. You order it and are given an approximate delivery date and that you have to wait until 7:00 pm before that date to get a window of delivery. Should be more information available.

Review.Titre: Excellent salesperson/Poor Delivery
Review.Contenu: Excellent salesperson, Andy, helped us purchase a mattress and adjustable base.  Love the new bed.  BUT, delivery was the worst that I have ever encountered.  Keep in mind, this happened exactly the same way two times in a row to have something delivered. Delivery was setup for a Saturday (one week after purchase).  We receive notice that our delivery will show up between 3:15 pm and 5:15 pm.  Never showed.  Then another text telling us that delivery was pushed back to 5:15 pm to 7:15 pm.  We cancel excellent plans for the evenings (both times).  Later in the evening we receive notice that delivery is now 7:15 pm to 9:15 pm.  Ya, right.  Keep in mind this happened two separate times.  I cannot believe a company like this can be so flippant about people's time.  They just kept stringing us along.  No concern whatsoever for our time.  Just RUDE!  And BTW, FYI, we never received an apology either time.

Review.Titre: Damaged in delivery
Review.Contenu: The entertainment center that I purchased on line arrived and was set up probably however it was damaged. A price of the corner on the back side was broken off. It is at the bottom so to most it is not noticeable however for me it is very noticeable.

Review.Titre: Your third party delivery service sucks!
Review.Contenu: Your third party delivery service sucks. We ordered a tv on May 2nd, it still has not arrived, 20 days later. That is totally unacceptable. If I could cancel this order, I would. I am re-thinking whether RC Willey is the right vendor for my business. Get rid of your shipping contractor and use a reputable company like FedEx or UPS.

Review.Titre: We like the product but found picking…
Review.Contenu: We like the product but found picking up difficult. There did not appear anywhere to designate someone other than purchaser from picking up. Then when they said we had to call your call center was closed and took many hoops to get someone added to pick up.

Review.Titre: Inexcusable, Unknown Shipping Knowledge
Review.Contenu: In the modern times, to not be able to provide your clients with definitive shipping timeframes is inexcusable. Using such reasoning as 'It's coming direct from the manufacturer' speaks volumes about the lack of communication between you and your vendor. Considering the product I am purchasing is offered by competitors at the same price and these competitors can tell us clients exactly when the product will be arriving (outside of any unexpected shipping delays) is something RC Wiley could learn something from. Please consider modernizing your supply chain communication to provide your clients much more precise information from which to make a better informed decision.

Review.Titre: I bought a refrigerator from Rc Wiley…
Review.Contenu: I bought a refrigerator from Rc Wiley the one with the ice maker inside. When was delivered it didn’t have the ice maker connected to it. The deliver said it would come Wednesday of the following week. Wednesday comes around and they delivered the ice maker installed it and now it doesn’t even work after waiting 24 hour for it to. I call RC Willy to let them know. Now I have to wait another week before I can get another one. They act like I don’t have a job and they can just pick a day and a time when ever they want to. They have know consideration for other peoples life. I just feel that they are so unprofessional. Sincerely Susan Arnold

Review.Titre: I followed the directions by calling…
Review.Contenu: I followed the directions by calling ahead 30 minutes before scheduled pickup.  Once I arrived, I called to notify of my arrival and the RC Willey employee said he now would need 15-20 minutes to "get" the item?  What was the reason for calling ahead 30 minutes prior, if he took no action.  There was no one there waiting for service, so what was the delay?

Review.Titre: Order arrived with a knick in table…
Review.Contenu: Order arrived with a knick in table top. Contacted Willey and they sent out another top quickly. Unfortunately they sent it to the wrong address. When I received email saying it was delivered I said I never received it. They said I had to deal with Fed Ex about it. Turns out it was shipped to wrong address. I don't live at that address anymore. It should have been shipped to the same address as the original table. Sent the info from Fed Ex showing where it was shipped 2 days ago and haven't heard a thing.

Review.Titre: 1 great piece 1 awful
Review.Contenu: We ordered a matching. Hest and dresser set. The 6 drawer dresser we received was great, in great condition and we assembled with no issue. Our 4 drawer dresser however came already used. There were holes in the wood where someone had made a mistake assembling it as well as chipped wood all over all the pieces from where they had screwed it together then apart..  we would love this other piece if it came in the same condition the other did. Disappointed it did not.

Review.Titre: I have had to wait,wait and wait to…
Review.Contenu: I have had to wait,wait and wait to many times! People are all doing the same, meanwhile behind the counter! A lot of your employees doing, who knows what? Salesman are are doing great!

Review.Titre: Got a run around from people when I…
Review.Contenu: Got a run around from people when I tried to add the president sale crockpot to my tv order. Customer service said I could just ask will call and they would create a bill for me. Will call said I had to go in and make purchase. People at purchase counter said will call could have done it. Was a little frustrating. Guy who helped me out at will call was great once they had my order right.

Review.Titre: Issue with availability.
Review.Contenu: When I originally tried to order a video game that the Layton store said they had in stock, it put a pending charge on my card and said it wasn’t available after. I had a reward that was about to expire so I ended up having to order something else I wasn’t planning on getting while I wait for the pending charge to roll off. But oh well.

Review.Titre: Business hours not accurate.
Review.Contenu: The hours listed on my pickup sheet, Rc Willey website, and google said they open at 10 am. Drove there and there is a note on the door saying the open at 11am. The lady made it sound like they always open at 11am. Marked down for inaccurate information provided to customers. The people working pickup were excellent. But the company wasted my time.

Review.Titre: Professionalism Lacking
Review.Contenu: Delivery was as expected, price was a little high. There was damage to the dryer in the form of dents, and the window was scuffed and scratched. (scratch and dent, but paid full price?) The drainage hose to the washer leaked (badly) and had to be replaced.Not impressed, or very happy with my experience with RC Willey. Won't buy from them again.

Review.Titre: $50.00 Rebate Cards Are Good for 90 Days from Issue
Review.Contenu: I am super happy with the Customer Service Rep, Ken and I love the Mattress that I got, but I was very disappointed that the Rebate Card I got from a prior purchase earlier in 2021 was only good for 90 days. I had ordered the item with the expectation that my 50.00 card was still good about 6 months later- I just did not read the FINE PRINT.

Review.Titre: Damaged out of the package
Review.Contenu: I have purchased from RC Willey's for years. However have always purchased in store. I tried purchasing online. The purchase itself was very easy and the delivery was prompt and on time. However both couches and recliner were damaged when they were unpacked in the truck. Not sure it was at the manufacturer or at the RC Willey warehouse. Usually I have a salesman to contact to get them returned. Since I bought online the delivery gentlemen said they were not sure how to go about the return.

Review.Titre: Delivery guys are rude!!!
Review.Contenu: This is the 2nd time I’ve had RC Willey deliver something for me.  The delivery guys acted completely put out to place the brand new tv in the box box inside my doorway for me, since I was on my way to work I didn’t want it sitting outside to get stolen or damaged.  The first time was a washer/dryer being delivered by different guys who put two huge holes in my walls of my brand new house with a huge scratch along another wall.  I felt like calling RC Willey but I knew it would be pointless.

Review.Titre: Online ordering isn’t easy
Review.Contenu: You’re mobile app would not allow delivery of the washer and dryer,  even though it should be as that’s what I needed.  I had to go through the website and login to get delivery, this was a bit frustrating.   Also, what is up with the dryer hook up set as pick up only???  Yet the washer hook up is available to be delivered with the washer and dryer.  You need to make these all part of the delivery.   Now I have to go to the hardware store to find parts for the dryer hook up.RC Willey didn’t read the statement.  Yes, I have delivery coming.  But I had to go about it in an odd way, as the app said it was available for pick up only.   And the fact that the parts I needed, we’re not available for delivery at the time I placed the order.   Although I did get an email yesterday and the dryer vent was suddenly available for delivery….next week.  Not with the delivery tomorrow.  Rolling my eyes now.

Review.Titre: Took 40 minutes to get my package after…
Review.Contenu: Took 40 minutes to get my package after arriving at will call

Review.Titre: I needed an entertainment cabinet that…
Review.Contenu: I needed an entertainment cabinet that couldn't exceed 50 inches.  I went to one of the stores, but no one seemed to want to find about the  Dimensions I was asking about.  The 50 inches was from the web site.  I made it work but without any help from RC Willey.

Review.Titre: I was told you delivered and set up and…
Review.Contenu: I was told you delivered and set up and you did not set up .

Review.Titre: I call to make sure someone else could…
Review.Contenu: I call to make sure someone else could pick up my item but they didn’t communicate between them and had to wait longer then they where supposed too

Review.Titre: 1-day Shipping delay on half of my…
Review.Contenu: 1-day Shipping delay on half of my appliances resulted in me not receiving my appliances for a month.  No communication about the delay prior to the initial delivery date.  On top of that, y’all tried to charge me for an extra delivery.  Unbelievable.

Review.Titre: I'm from Utah
Review.Contenu: I'm from Utah, for over 50 years my family has stopped a RC WILLEY .All I want to complain about is your stupid commercials on TV. You don't need to tell the public that you are taking extra precautions and showing your sales team putting on face masks. That's not extra, that's mandatory. It just makes you look stupid.

Review.Titre: Delivery is a JOKE!
Review.Contenu: I ordered my items on Labor Day.  I was told merchandise would be here Oct and Nov.  I was called on Nov 24 stating that PART of my purchase was here. My washer and dryer still aren't here.  The EARLIEST delivery was December 30, because "they only have one truck per week that comes this way".  That's 5 weeks from the time the merchandise arrived!  Completely unacceptable!

Review.Titre: Purchased delivery with assembly to…
Review.Contenu: Purchased delivery with assembly to discover when it was dropped off this item would not qualify for assembly. Box is still on my bedroom floor where they left it. An alert on the website or a call during scheduling would have been very helpful.

Review.Titre: Don’t trust their warranties
Review.Contenu: Don’t trust their warranties! We bought a fridge and it broke Saturday, and they have yet to do anything about it and it’s now Wednesday. That’s a long time to not have a fridge!!!!!! I’ve called and talked to so many different ppl who have just transferred me to yet another person. Apparently they can’t find someone to come fix it....so thanks for the “warranty” RC Willey.

Review.Titre: No furniture removal
Review.Contenu: We purchased a couch and loveseat set from the Orem store, we called RC Willey customer support to see if we needed to remove the old pieces or if they would take them away when after dropping off the new items.  We were assured by customer service that they would take care of removing them no problem not to worry.  When the delivery showed up we were told they would not take the old set and could not even help us move them outside to help make room for the new ones.  All we could do was stack everything together in the living room until they left and then disassemble the old piece by piece in order to remove it and haul it off.

Review.Titre: Purchased a leather recliner rocker on…
Review.Contenu: Purchased a leather recliner rocker on October 2016. While reluctant to purchase an electric chair, we were told that the chair is highly reliable. Well 2 years later we called for repair because the motor stopped working.  They fixed it free because it fell under the warranty.  And here we are again with a chair that won’t work and have been told that they can’t cover it because it’s not warrantied.  This is quite frustrating for a chair that cost $1000.00 and now we are stuck with it not working. The sales people should not be telling customers that these are reliable.  We have bought so much furniture from RC Willey and we are quite disappointed.

Review.Titre: They put two holes in the couch and the…
Review.Contenu: They put two holes in the couch and the cheesecloth they came out and patched them even though it's on the bottom it's still a new couch with two patches that you can easily see they brought me the wrong two lamps I had to go back to the store take it to them and then pick out two other lamps then I that was a full living room set I paid for the one time shipment for a year and delivery and set up anyway when I took the lamps back I bought a $600 TV table was never given the option of delivery or whatever so I had to go to their warehouse and pick it up on 107° day and get it in my house and I'm on the second floor by myself cuz it was assembled it was almost impossible and I got a flat tire while I was out there they did give me $150 RC Willey card but to me that doesn't come close to making up for the aggravation I put up

Review.Titre: Poverty-ridden Countries
Review.Contenu: If you want a good supply this is the place. Sales people are very nice.However, their furniture comes from poverty-ridden countries like Vietnam. We remodel our home and bought furniture and flooring from RC Willey. Our new dinning table kept chipping, end tables chipping. The final blow for me was our new bed falling apart. All I could see was Made In Vietnam. They sell you cheap furniture made by underpaid forced labor. They also charge absorbent prices for poor quality furniture.

Review.Titre: My wife and I bought a new washer and…
Review.Contenu: My wife and I bought a new washer and dryer from the dent and scratch section and the washer didn’t even work. So we had to borrow another truck to bring it all the way back and we had to pay even more for another washer. Kind of a joke.

Review.Titre: Just ok...
Review.Contenu: I had to run out and pick my son up while the delivery men were removing my old refrigerator. When I returned, I discovered that they removed the bins and shelves from the doors were left on the floor in my house and on the front porch. One of the shelves was upside down, with bolts dumped out. This was a disappointment when things were going very well. Hence, only giving 2 stars. JD was great - super attentive and found a way to have the fridge delivered earlier than estimated.

Review.Titre: No sale just increased the price 2 days before and put it back to original price and say it is on sale
Review.Contenu: I go inside and look at sofa that was last week $1599 and during the memorial day weekend it said it was on sale and sales price was $1599 and when I told the that they said it was $1799 I told them that’s not the case and showed them the picture and the agent did not know what to say

Review.Titre: I do not recommend Janet in the carpet…
Review.Contenu: I do not recommend Janet in the carpet department. She did not call me back one time when she said she would. This happened several times. I also had a hard time getting a hold of the secretary in the carpet department. When I did talk with Janet, she did not pay attention well to the conversation. The other departments have been great to work with but had a very poor experience with carpet.

Review.Titre: I was told my order would be deviled …
Review.Contenu: I was told my order would be deviled  Feb 11 by the end of the day, then get a e-mail that says it will come the next day, I work on Saturday and if it comes after 3pm, it will set on my porch overnight. this frustrating.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: Did not have the Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+ in-stock at Draper, had to get it shipped there from the warehouse. The path to the Customer Pick Up department was not labeled so I had to ask 2 employees how to get there.

Review.Titre: Major disappointment
Review.Contenu: Love RC Willey’s furniture. However my brand new carpet now needs to be cleaned because the delivery guys did not wear booties over their shoes. There were 3 items that were damaged, my couch and bookshelf weren't sent. Apparently they won’t be here for 3-8 weeks. I’ll think twice about ever buying from RC WILLEY’s again

Review.Titre: Poor delivery
Review.Contenu: Did not delivery on original scheduled date.  Then they rescheduled for the next date and didn't show up during the scheduled time.  I had to call and they finally showed up three hours later. Did not delivery on original scheduled date.  Then they rescheduled for the next date and didn't show up during the scheduled time.  I had to call and they finally showed up three hours later.

Review.Titre: Letter did not match delivery
Review.Contenu: We got a notice the night before saying our stove would be delivered between 9:30 A.M. and 12:30 P.M.  That was fine.  Finally at almost 2:00 I called and was told that we were on the afternoon delivery and it would be delivered between 5:45 and 9:00 P.M.  We shot the whole day waiting.  The deliverymen were very nice, helpful.  But someone in the scheduling dept. messed up big time.  It arrived about 5:30.

Review.Titre: Horrible customer service
Review.Contenu: I bought a dishwasher online but when the day came to pick it up from the store I simply wanted my husband to pick it up instead of me. I called customer service to make sure this would be ok and was transferred many times over and each time the person helping me was blank, slow or plain RUDE. I won't be going through this ever again with this company. I have too many choices for my purchasing needs.

Review.Titre: Tv works great and boxed up
Review.Contenu: Tv works great and boxed up. I got no email that the shipment was sent or delivered through RC Willey. I had to find that information through FedEx.

Review.Titre: Sold me a couch they didn't have.
Review.Contenu: Ordered 2 couches online. Delivery truck only brought me one. Told me to call customer service because my 2nd couch was on back order. Customer service told me that they were out of stock and not selling that couch anymore. I was sold a couch RCWILLEY did not have. After going in to the store and five phone calls I settled for a color I did not want. It was ridiculous.

Review.Titre: Pretty Good
Review.Contenu: Our experience was basically good and the website is user friendly. However, we saw no reason to wade through all of the recliners that were out of stock. Seems like that should be sorted better.

Review.Titre: It was very frustrating to have to call…
Review.Contenu: It was very frustrating to have to call customer service and have them give me the wrong information that I had to go physically go into the store to update my credit info and could not do it over the phone. I hung up and called back and talked to someone who knew what they were doing and updated my info over the phone. The process took and extra hour to get my order complete because of the the first person.

Review.Titre: Package is being delivered during the…
Review.Contenu: Package is being delivered during the day and requires a signature. Had to pay fedex to change delivery to a time I will be home. Would have picked up from store if I knew that ahead of time

Review.Titre: Driving to Summerlin’s to get the air…
Review.Contenu: Driving to Summerlin’s to get the air fryer. I live in Henderson.

Review.Titre: Your website is very glitchy and kept…
Review.Contenu: Your website is very glitchy and kept rejecting my order for supposed missing information. It was all there and the order went through but it still kept telling me it didn’t.

Review.Titre: Ordered online
Review.Contenu: Ordered online, selected free delivery. When the order went thru it said self pick-up. Called the 800 number was told I had schedule that with the local store. Called the local store was told a refrigerator was too big for delivery.

Review.Titre: Ordered online and set up delivery
Review.Contenu: Ordered online and set up delivery. Was very easy. Sectional was delivered on time but the arm was punctured when the delivery was made when the plastic was being removed. The piece is being replaced but it really should not have been ripped in the first place. Now it will be another 7 days before it is hopefully complete and intact.

Review.Titre: We recently moved to Las Vegas
Review.Contenu: We recently moved to Las Vegas.  Purchased almost all of our furniture for the entire house from RC Willey.  Customer service is great and they have a great selection.  The biggest issue I am finding is there has been damages on almost all the pieces of furniture.  Receiving more than one piece at a time I did not look as close as I should have.  Make sure to look things over carefully when delivered.

Review.Titre: I called to ask questions about…
Review.Contenu: I called to ask questions about ordering online.  If I had to put stuff together myself, how heavy item was, return policy, etc.  I had to call back.  To get information I needed.  Being an older woman, I was concerned about getting item in my house by myself.  If person on the phone had been more interested he could have given me more and better answers so I didn’t hav3 to call back.  Now item is being delivered and I don’t think delivery service cares if I signor not and item may be just left on my porch for me to try to get it in the house…..

Review.Titre: Prices were okay
Review.Contenu: Prices are good.  They had what I wanted.  I was offered a discount for signing up for an email but the discount was never applied.I should note that the web side failed with a 404 error and I didn’t get any information on the discount or an email.

Review.Titre: Don't purchase the 3rd party items if you need delivery dates
Review.Contenu: I ordered from your page and because the product is sourced from the vendor, versus through "RC Wiley", I now have zero clue as to when my package will arrive. I was hoping it'd of been sooner, but unfortunately it's looking as though it will be later.

Review.Titre: Your delivery process doesn’t explain…
Review.Contenu: Your delivery process doesn’t explain anything like the person who ordered the product must be home. You don’t get to pick a day for delivery. It’s just assigned. They don’t mention anything about being home until after the order has been placed. Terrible practice on RC Wiley parts of complete disclosure.

Review.Titre: On line order was easy
Review.Contenu: On line order was easy. Somehow missed that I was supposed to call before i left my house for Will-call pick up. When I arrived and called to pick up my item I was told my item may come out in five minutes or an hour or longer, that they weren't sure. Ultimately it took 20 minutes to find my order, but the lack of direction or clarity was stressful as my schedule is full and didn't have the time to sit aroundmuch longer.

Review.Titre: Search function was clunky
Review.Contenu: Search function was clunky. Neither myself or wife were able to scroll down to the “apply selections” buttons at the bottom of the page (I-phone). Being unable to edit the search left me unable to narrow my search or filter it. This made searching slow and time consuming. We ended up buying a sectional, but ultimately I went to Best Buy online to buy a TV because it was easier.

Review.Titre: Over priced
Review.Contenu: Over priced, salesperson said it's shipping costs have gone up so buyers have to eat the difference. Also didn't care for being followed around an hour straight, the salespeople have pressure to make their money, too obvious, and if I spend 7,300$ ,which I did, maybe throw in a pillow, I asked, was denied. Soon as I left felt like I already regretted my purchase, everyday I've thought about canceling before the delivery.

Review.Titre: Products are great, Service needs work
Review.Contenu: Products are great, customer service online was great, but in-store customer service needs work. All RC Willey furniture should be deliverable. Appalled that I couldn’t not have a dresser delivered. Had to cancel my in-store purchase, and was only able to move forward with just my online purchase.

Review.Titre: Treadmill Disappointment
Review.Contenu: I ordered a Nortitrack 1750 treadmill which wasn’t cheap. I paid for the blue ribbon treatment which apparently only includes dropping shipment off in the room desired. For the amount of money spend they should have included assembly. I did have to hire a professional to come assemble it. I don’t recommend purchasing this item here but rather through a company that includes the assembly of it.

Review.Titre: Multi Color Glass Luminaria Lamp
Review.Contenu: Multi Color Glass Luminaria Lamp - Trident Way is what I purchased.  The only glass in the lamp is the 40-watt bulb we purchased for the lamp.  It is built well and the delivery was punctual.  Thank you.  Other than that, I like its size and design.  Just wished it were glass.

Review.Titre: Rude Delivery Services
Review.Contenu: Everything went well but the delivery; I requested delivery guys to put shoe covers on but they said they don’t do it. I requested if they don’t have shoe covers they can remove their shoes but they rudely said if you want we can assemble the product and leave it front door.

Review.Titre: Pricing is deceptive and inconsistent…
Review.Contenu: Pricing is deceptive and inconsistent across multiple visits to the site for the same product. Not just the same class of product, but the exact same make/model number.  And not sale prices, but the supposed "base price" did not stay the same from one visit to the next.

Review.Titre: shipping costs are too high for out of…
Review.Contenu: shipping costs are too high for out of area customers. there shouldn't be an $800 per item shipping cost that is more than the actual cost to ship something, let along multi items in one order.Other than that, the products are always high quality.

Review.Titre: fridge purchased
Review.Contenu: I got my fridge purchased for my grandfather and I was told he can come and pick it up because they have it in stock so he traveled an hour to get there and then after 20 mins or so looking for it they couldn't find it. Now he won't get it for another 3 days!

Review.Titre: RC Willey lacking the basics for internet-based puirchase experience
Review.Contenu: Strike one - The website doesn't allow you to set up, or pay for, installation.Strike two - Not the first time I've had problems with this company and its lack of ability to provide an easy purchase, delivery, and installation experience.This is where it ends.  No strike three.  The installers were spectacular.  They contacted me and were on time.  They were professional and courteous.While RC Willey was disappointing, at least the installer (a third-party contractor) was excellent.

Review.Titre: Be prepared to wait when picking up will call order
Review.Contenu: Be prepared to wait when picking up an item from Will Call. Called ahead and told them that I was on my way, arrived 40 minutes later and still ended up waiting 20+ minutes.  The item was fine and packed well. Nothing wrong there, just need to figure out a better system so people aren't waiting that long.

Review.Titre: I got an email and call that my writing…
Review.Contenu: I got an email and call that my writing desk would be delivered 8-9 am problem is I work and was only given a days notice. So I came home and had the cleaning products but no desk. I called the store here and they said nothing they could do since I ordered online. No options for delivery no good.

Review.Titre: We ordered and received our couches
Review.Contenu: We ordered and received our couches.  The one couch was used, torn and dirty.  Customer service was great and the delivery people were great  just an unnecessary   situation and waste of time........2nd delivery went well

Review.Titre: Susan was great
Review.Contenu: Susan was great. She tried to cancel the order and the manufacturer didn't respond and shipped the order right away. Susan will send a pickup order and retrieve the order. Thanks to Susan I am very satisfied with everything and will continue to be a RC Willey customer. The manufacturer ??? Thanks Susan.

Review.Titre: Beautiful product; crappy delivery company
Review.Contenu: It was easy to place the order, but I was asked to schedule a delivery day/time. I did that and also took time off work to be home. Then got a call from the delivery company saying they were delivering it a day early. I asked for the next day (the day I scheduled) and she said no, it wasn't negotiable. Why ask us to schedule if you're not going to stick to it? Item shows up - delivery people tried talking to me and they didn't know english so couldn't answer my questions. They also asked me what something meant on the receipt because they couldn't understand it. Hate to sound racist, but they need to know at least a little english so they can communicate and understand what they are supposed to do. That said, I love my new furniture!

Review.Titre: Order # 48014153 still pending
Review.Contenu: One item was damaged. They scheduled a delivery with the replacement and the driver called the day of and cancelled because the item in his vehicle was also damaged. He said you will be contacting me to reschedule but as of today I haven't heard from you nor I have received the replacement.

Review.Titre: Cracked door
Review.Contenu: My husband and I drove an hour and fifteen minutes one way to pick up an 82 in media cabinet. Got home, set it up. It’s beautiful, but stepped back to get a good look and found the left cupboard has a huge crack in the wood and the glue is exposed down the door. I called and they could not help me at the Summerlin store where we bought it. I was on hold for a very long time for the warehouse before I was told we had to be inconvenienced by driving all the way back to pick up a new door. I kindly protested and was put on hold again. I was finally told it could be delivered but it would be nearly two weeks before someone could get out to deliver it. I am not happy with this. I am picking up the door in Summerlin on Tuesday because I have a dinner party planned and don’t want a subpar price of furniture in my brand new house. My dad recently spent 7k on new appliances at this store and recommended it to me. I want to buy more furniture, but I wasn’t happy with the customer service. I have pictures and no one seemed to want them.

Review.Titre: I received a $50 off coupon and unable…
Review.Contenu: I received a $50 off coupon and unable to use it online which is frustrating since one of the pieces of furniture is not available in store. So now I have to go in store to purchase the other furniture to be able to use my discount.

Review.Titre: We were missing a part to our bed
Review.Contenu: We were missing a part to our bed, and are now waiting for a replacement part. Some of the parts are a little bit damaged, like scuff marks and a couple indentation in the wood. Not the kind of quality I expected from RC Willey. Order #48280483

Review.Titre: Delivery crew
Review.Contenu: Delivery guy said he is by himself delivering to the entire Valley I understand I was just late for 10 minutes but my main issue is you don’t need to be rude speaking to people if you can’t wait because you will run out of time just say sorry I can’t do it ! Told him just leave it in the driveway coz we are almost there .Thank you!

Review.Titre: I don’t like that I wasn’t approved or…
Review.Contenu: I don’t like that I wasn’t approved or denied for credit I was told to come into the store to complete. No thanks. My bank gave me credit saved me on interest. Would thank you but it was all a big hassle. I also find it tiresome that you require the card used At purchase at time of pickup. I’m sending my husband with my card you could just as easily ask for his state issued ID but no again more hassle.

Review.Titre: It was easy to buy online
Review.Contenu: It was easy to buy online.  That part I liked.  I thought the wait to get my microwave was too long.  I called ahead.  The parking lot was pretty empty.  I could have walked in and purchased it from the store in the time it took to bring it out.

Review.Titre: We purchased a dishwasher and after it…
Review.Contenu: We purchased a dishwasher and after it was installed the lower spray arm was not working. The salesman told us to call whirlpool to have it repaired. He should have called for us! I  was not going to have a brand new unit repaired. That is just wrong. Called and s/w the Appliance Mgr who found another unit in another state. It was replaced/switched out a week later. The delivery guy who came the 2nd time was great. The salesman I was not very impressed with. Very pushy.

Review.Titre: Staff Tried But to No Avail
Review.Contenu: The staff were friendly and tried to help but your policy on application of promotional coupon is not very reasonable.  I had a coupon for completing a survey on 5/2323 for $50 and couldn't use it on-line for $46 charge.  It had to be $49.99.  I was sent to 4 people who all tried and last was web .com group.  I had to use my credit card to try and use the coupon and Tom from .com gave me a credit refund because I couldn't use the $50 coupon.  The survey code was SURV23.  :(

Review.Titre: I had a rebate of $266 to use and I was…
Review.Contenu: I had a rebate of $266 to use and I was only ably to apply $169.99 so I was able to get the garage heatwr I also wanted.  Now I still have &100 on rebate that will go to wasteYes we had more on the order but had to remove it because wewould ha e been charged over $100 to process the order.

Review.Titre: Some people you really shouldn't keep employed
Review.Contenu: I didn't like the fact when I asked your associate where to pick up my arcade machine at he acted very stupid.If you're wondering who, I didn't get a good look at his name cause I was very annoyed with him. he was an older oriental guy. We were 20 feet away from the customer pickup area when he came up asking me if he could help me and I told him I am here to pickup my arcade game I just bought. That's when he started acting all stupid asking me like a child would in know what arcade machine even was let alone any kind of video game then proceeded to toy with me on where the pickup area was even though we were very near it at the time. This was around I believe at like 1:30pm' ish. my wife was outside moving the car to the pickup area. it was just me in there trying to find the place. As I told your associate it's my first time there I don't know my way around.

Review.Titre: Pay process unpredictable
Review.Contenu: When I make a payment it always comes in on an unknown date almost a week later through my checking account and it almost always gets an overdraft fee because i forgot.

Review.Titre: It would be nice to know delivery times…
Review.Contenu: It would be nice to know delivery times before 7pm the day before. People do have full time jobs

Review.Titre: I could not sign into my account
Review.Contenu: I could not sign into my account. I tried to reset the password and it would loop continuously not allowing me to enter the password.

Review.Titre: Our sectional sofa was delivered in 4…
Review.Contenu: Our sectional sofa was delivered in 4 boxes. Two came on the 20th, and the other two on the 23rd. The cushion covers were very wrinkled, and hard to get the wrinkles out.

Review.Titre: When it says in stock on the web site…
Review.Contenu: When it says in stock on the web site it doesn't tell you that it's in Salt Lake City and not Las Vegas where you are shopping.

Review.Titre: The window for delivery was too wide…
Review.Contenu: The window for delivery was too wide and the y came way past the delivery time that was provided.

Review.Titre: It was so so
Review.Contenu: It was so so. Driver knew nothing about the sofa or how to use/or connect pillows with the zippers that are on dofs

Review.Titre: I went to pick my purchase up the day…
Review.Contenu: I went to pick my purchase up the day it was telling me on my order email and they didn't got it

Review.Titre: Crazy delivery
Review.Contenu: Ordered 2 bookcases. Was told I’d get an email when they shipped. One bookcase showed up in 3 days but I never got an email, so wasn’t sure where the other one was. Couldn’t track them and RC Wiley website showed the order as complete. Had to call customer service to see where my other bookcase was. Disappointed never got an email alert that they shipped

Review.Titre: RC Wiley always has great selections…
Review.Contenu: RC Wiley always has great selections snd unique items.  I don’t like that there are pictures of end tables and coffee tables in same design but not available.  Also for the premium price of my table it arrived in a torn box with various scuff marks,  these high priced items should have RC Wiley truck delivery

Review.Titre: I ordered 2 items
Review.Contenu: I ordered 2 items, but when I went to pick them up, one was not in the store.  If I would have known, I would have waited so that I only needed to make one trip.

Review.Titre: Tried to buy some small items online…
Review.Contenu: Tried to buy some small items online and even though it was listed as in stock, it couldn’t be shipped. Normally I would set to pick up in store but I just went through surgery. So I needed to find an item that could be delivered to use up my rewards certificate.

Review.Titre: I ordered an item online and when I got…
Review.Contenu: I ordered an item online and when I got to will call to pick it up I was told that the item was a floor model and was actually out of stock... Confusing and a waist of time. The will call team was great at fixing the issue and assisted with getting me upstairs to pick out a different model. Big kudos to them. Carson was awesome!

Review.Titre: So far you have done what you have…
Review.Contenu: So far you have done what you have committed to do, I don’t have the product yet.

Review.Titre: Overall I really like RC Willey
Review.Contenu: Overall I really like RC Willey.  However, the salesman that helped me on the 18th, lied to me.  I was looking for 2 space heaters, had checked online and was told they were in stock at the store.  He told me the only space heaters that were available were the 2 on close out and that the one I purchased was brand new, just had a damaged box.  However, when I got home and opened the box, I discovered a repair order included. When I read my receipt it said "open container as is".  I choose to keep the heater but was not happy with the salesman.  I picked up the second heater I wanted the next day simply by ordering it online.  It was in the store.

Review.Titre: Went to buy a new fridge …
Review.Contenu: Went to buy a new fridge …. But when I went to pick it up I just happened to check it … it was the wrong fridge salesman put it in wrong after some discussion it was fixed only to find out you were out of my fridge I had purchased so I now have the wrong fridge and have to wait until mid November to get the fridge I bought

Review.Titre: I spent nearly three hours trying to…
Review.Contenu: I spent nearly three hours trying to complete my purchase, and it looked like it went through.  I did not. I thought that I had ordered the item and it could be picked up in two days. The order did not register. I found that when I tried to go to pick it up one day earlier. I thought I was dealing with your store in Draper. I found out they did not have this item available there. It was at the warehouse in Salt Lake City. The service there was outstanding and I was able to get the item.

Review.Titre: Disappointed-Lack of information
Review.Contenu: I bought 2 additional dining chairs for pickup and no where was it mentioned that the customer had to be put the chars together. That would have made a difference for me since they costed $150 each plus tax. The ones I bought before were already assembled.

Review.Titre: your website is not very user…
Review.Contenu: your website is not very user friendly....

Review.Titre: Even though I paid the $69 for delivery…
Review.Contenu: Even though I paid the $69 for delivery and set up, there was an error with the online system and it was never communicated to the delivery team. After some arguing (understandable as they don't get paid if they install when someone didn't pay for it) they agreed to install it, and had to take a photo of my order to prove we paid. Very unprofessional on rcwilley.com's side. The delivery team was great other than that hiccup.

Review.Titre: The guys who delivered the TV were…
Review.Contenu: The guys who delivered the TV were great. But don't tell me 3 hours before my delivery, at 5:30 am, that my delivery time has been moved up 2 hours earlier on a Saturday am on a holiday weekend. That's lousy communication and an unreasonable expectation.

Review.Titre: Great store great people a 5
Review.Contenu: Great store great people a 5 . Going from appliances to furniture to electronic you deal with different tags and different people. Then when you pay they take a while to put it all together ( different tags) . We had 3 tags. Makes no sense. Isn’t efficient. Waisting time. Took a long time.

Review.Titre: We ordered a bed and dresser for our…
Review.Contenu: We ordered a bed and dresser for our son. When we received the dresser, the top piece was damaged I reached out to RC and was told I could get a replacement piece but still waiting on that. The head board doesn’t fit the bed, the wrong size was sent so waiting to hear about what we can do to solve that, kind of frustrating to have two mis haps with one order for our sons first bedroom set. Also, was  not expecting “ikea-esque” furniture from rc Wiley.

Review.Titre: My sales agent was awesome
Review.Contenu: My sales agent was awesome. However, I came in the day prior and was unable to make a purchase due to the sales agent walked away he found out we were not making a substantial purchase. My wife and I was discussing which stools and bed frame to purchase when the agent just walked away. I return the next day and had a much better experience.

Review.Titre: Smoke and no packaging
Review.Contenu: I ordered online and picked up at will call at the store. While I was waiting there was an employee vaping on the loading dock. This is at least irritating and most likely illegal since it is considered the same way as smoking in most instances. Also, when I received my chair, it was not in a box. I believe the cardboard was given to another customer to help him secure his coffee table to the top of his vehicle. I could have given him the cardboard myself but I would have been much happier to have received my product in its original packaging. And without having smoke blown in my face.

Review.Titre: Waited 2 days to pick up chair that wasn’t even assembled
Review.Contenu: I had to wait two days to pick up my office chair that wasn’t even assembled. The guy at will call offered to assemble it but I was already late. He was nice, it wasn’t his fault. I was just upset because I explicitly bought this chair from RC Willey because it didn’t say “assembly required” and it’s not easy for me to put this together.

Review.Titre: Customer service and pickup experience…
Review.Contenu: Customer service and pickup experience was great.  However, when we took our "brand new" GE refrigerator out of the cardboard box, it was FILTHY.  Inside and out.  It looked like it had been outside in a construction zone for a week before it was boxed.  It took me over an hour to clean it up enough that we could install it.  Other than that, it seems to work fine.

Review.Titre: Did not arrive as promised
$5,000 couch & won’t get til Nov
Review.Contenu: We purchased a $5,000 couch September 23rd and it won’t be here until November. It makes me wanna shop elsewhere for a better deal, cancel my order and order from another dealer.

Review.Titre: I think the delivery could be quicker…
Review.Contenu: I think the delivery could be quicker than 10 days.  I'm needing as soon as possible and if I was able to drive the 2hrs to pick it up to get it quicker I would have.

Review.Titre: Product missing crucial parts for the…
Review.Contenu: Product missing crucial parts for the product ! Had to get a hold of the manufacturer hopefully they can send the missing parts . Meaning that this product was probably an open box . Wish by the way I did ask if this was an unopened box I was told that it was brand new! 😞 not new !

Review.Titre: Ok experience
Review.Contenu: RC Willey cannot seem to make a delivery without damaging either the product I purchased, my home or both. They do have good selection and good prices.

Review.Titre: I have no one to assist me
Review.Contenu: I have no one to assist me. And I need to cancel an order.  There's no option to do so online.Reply:  I called.  Am waiting for email by Wednesday of the cancellation.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: Only giving three stars as I ordered on…
Review.Contenu: Only giving three stars as I ordered on line spoke to no one an have to pay a sixty dollar delivery charge for a set that was a thousand dollars not to mention the tax. Having to wait three weeks for the delivery as well. RC Wiley could do better since I don’t have the privilege of living that close to Salt Lake.

Review.Titre: Great service however, delivered broken items
Review.Contenu: We ordered all new kitchen appliances for a kitchen remodel. Carlos at the store is amazing! He is always helpful, honest and great to work with. I would have left a five star review but, our fridge arrived with a HUGE dent in the door. There isn’t a replacement, and now we’re looking at possibly months for a replacement door. I always have that feeling of “are my things going to come in one piece”. Unfortunately for us they did not… the delivery guys were nice, however the broke my crap. Very disappointing

Review.Titre: We purchased a dishwasher
Review.Contenu: We purchased a dishwasher, a dishwasher installation kit, and the delivery/install/take-away option online. The dishwasher was delivered.....and that's it. It was not installed like we paid for, nor was the installation kit delivered with it. Still waiting for our refund on the delivery/install/take-away that didn't happen and the installation kit that was never delivered. It's been 2 weeks now.

Review.Titre: Really like the cabinet but....
Review.Contenu: Really like the cabinet but I ordered 2 of them. Only one delivered. Had to call to find out what happened to the other one. Was told it was backordered even though there was no communication of this. It's a month later and still don't have the second one. Called yesterday for an update and still waiting response. Customer service after the sale leaves much to be desired.

Review.Titre: I love RC Willey but they failed to tell me about additional charges
Review.Contenu: My treadmill was delivered before the time scheduled and the people who brought it were polite and professional. My only complaint was that they asked for $30 to install the sport package.  I had no idea what they were talking about. The paperwork I had clearly showed I was not going to have to pay any money at delivery. I thought RC Willey would have told me if I needed to pay money at delivery. I felt blindsided.

Review.Titre: Ogden store. INSANE POLICY
Review.Contenu: Ogden store: Mr. Winget excellent sales person.  Went home thought about options. Called back to purchase. Sales person wrote up, had to call back on store phone again to pay because they transferred me to his cell. Was unable to do more than put 20% down over phone with debit or pay pal validated account. Went online. Completed an order. Debit or pay pal works and delivery was less. $16 saved. Credit was also able to be given to sales person. Explained to him. 3-4 extra days to delivery. INSANE POLICY

Review.Titre: The process on the web was fine, but
Review.Contenu: The process on the web was fine, picking up the item was a pain. I was instructed to call 30 mon before pick up, your rep was rude, condescending, & almost mean. I explained I am hard of hearing, using a Bluetooth while driving to get there on time on rush hour traffic after working a 10 hour day. She needs a different job, one that doesn't require people skills. The warehouse personnel however were delightful & quick.

Review.Titre: Furniture required assembly
Review.Contenu: Furniture required assembly.  I would have gone to IKEA if I wanted to put my furniture together.  RC Willey did reach out to make this right, and it's appreciated.  Also, this was the first and only negative experience I have had with RC Willey and have furnished my home there.

Review.Titre: I ordered a chair an d it took 3 trys…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a chair an d it took 3 trys to get it right. Wrong color was sent then the next chair was damaged the next one had a stain anyways they were nice about it and they finally sent the right chair. It was quite a long process but I love the chair. Customer service was not bad either. Thanks rc willey for being persistent and making things right

Review.Titre: The main issue I had was that online it…
Review.Contenu: The main issue I had was that online it said the Bosch dishwasher was in stock. I go through the whole purchase order, picked free delivery, select date and pay. Then it said the item is not in stock. Tried for about a week, and then after it said not in stock, I tried again and clicked pick up. Then it was available. I feel like if you really don't want to offer free delivery, then don't offer it or only out certain things available for delivery.

Review.Titre: I really like the counter stools I got
Review.Contenu: I really like the counter stools I got.  They are beautiful.  My only complaint is that when they touch each other is takes the stain off and leaves a mark on the stool.  I fill like I will be touching up the marks on the stools all the time.  Other than that they are pretty,  the delivery was great and I am satisfied with them.

Review.Titre: Good product, Poor service
Review.Contenu: The price and product (LG refrigerator) was very good. The reason for lower grade was the delivery. Delivery drivers, coming in the midst of the Covid / Omicron surge were unmasked. Given that we (my wife and I) were masked, they should have masked up. Not doing so is insensitive, unprofessional and highly disappointing.

Review.Titre: I don’t think I will ever order online
Review.Contenu: I don’t think I will ever order online. Since they will not assemble the product I purchased online. Every time I have some thing delivered to my house that was purchase in store, they always assemble the purchase  item. But ordering online, they will deliver but not assemble.

Review.Titre: Shocked, coming from RC Willey!
Review.Contenu: Well, things are changing.  I wish I had bought most of my furniture while stationed in S. Korea, better craftsmanship, quality, and less $$.  Purchased the Alix Multi Grey Dresser, evidently a piece of crap quality on sale for $500 plus tax at RC Willey.  Drawer almost fell out and hanging, and I was simply wiping the inside clean, lightly! Even IKEA furniture don’t fall apart right after delivery. Yeah, you could say they gave me a lemon… Top it off, they can’t fix it ‘till 8 days later!  My 84 year old mother is not pleased.

Review.Titre: Love the bedroom furniture set we…
Review.Contenu: Love the bedroom furniture set we ordered.  However, it arrived with the two nightstands damaged on the top and a few drawers in the dresser scratched.  It took 5 months to get the replacement nightstands.  And when the damaged drawers were replaced int the dresser, they don't fit quite right.

Review.Titre: Loud recliners haha
Review.Contenu: Wasn't happy with my new rocking recliner every time you rocked the sides would rub and make a loud friction noise ..I told them I don't want it and they said over time the noise will go away its now been a couple months and guess what its still there...I said I would like for them to come get them and to my surprise no one never showed up so now looks like I'm stuck with them...I did speak to someone about it someone came out and said there's nothing they can do to fix it that someone would reach out and no one did

Review.Titre: Three lovely counter stools
Review.Contenu: We received our three chosen, crazy expensive but perfect, counter stools in a timely manner, politely, and very appropriately.The next day, investigating why two of the stools were wobbly, we discovered that two of each stool's legs had very damaged plastic plugs that were not acceptable. We then checked the stable stool's legs and found that there were NO PADS AT ALL protecting the new tile floor.  The legs end in with very sharp cut metal. We put cardboard under each chair and called for replacement stools.  We haven't received the new ones yet.How disappointing! Wish us luck with the second set.

Review.Titre: Great and not so great
Review.Contenu: Purchasing online wasn’t good but customer service was great.Ps. Called back customer service and got a wonderful lady that helped me. However upon returning the item it was a hassle. The person who should have taken it at “will call” didn’t do her job. I had to go inside, only to be told to go back to “will call” because all they had to do was take the item as everything was previously done. I had to do all this will my 7 months old son who had just done his surgery the day before. So I move my eating to a 3. It hurts when some employees do their best and others don’t.

Review.Titre: In November 2021
Review.Contenu: In November, I purchased a washer and dryer set/ It was delivered with the door attached on the wrong side (its a reversible door, I guess). The young man was supposed to have someone come back out to correct it the following week, He said he didn't know how to do it and didn't have the right tools. No one has ever shown up. I contacted the store several times and never got a return phone call about this issue (the manager was always busy to take my calls). In January, I gave up. I purchased a small bakeware set the other day, but purchased my freezer (purchased 5/13) at a competitor, that hopefully has good customer service after a sale.

Review.Titre: Web Purchasing
Review.Contenu: I found it kind of difficult to gain access to your web site.  After, resetting passwords, getting confirmation and calling in, I was able to get on line to FINALLY review your products.  I did find what I needed but with more effort that I thought was necessary

Review.Titre: I'm only giving 3 stars due to problems…
Review.Contenu: I'm only giving 3 stars due to problems with delivery.  Our delivery window was between 12:15 & 2:15 pm.  They never showed up until almost 7 pm.  I didn't get any phone calls and had to call RC Willey 2 times trying to figure out where they were.

Review.Titre: My refrigerator didn't get transferred…
Review.Contenu: My refrigerator didn't get transferred from the Sacramento warehouse, so it was not delivered on Tuesday. I had a dinner party on Friday without a refrigerator.  It was delivered on Saturday morning at 0730. It was to be delivered between 8 and 10am.

Review.Titre: I think it’s unfair that I had to come…
Review.Contenu: I think it’s unfair that I had to come in and check on the mirror to a bedroom set that I purchased 3 months ago that should’ve arrived 7/29/20. I should’ve received a call giving me a update. I was told that it wouldn’t be in until 12/25 and after my sale associate talked to the manager he said he could do me a favor and order it to be shipped to The Roseville warehouse and it would arrive in September some time... wow!!

Review.Titre: I got the couch I wanted
Review.Contenu: I got the couch I wanted. So that was fine. Dhana was helpful and kind. We also bought a mattress and were interested in buying a piece of CLOSE OUT, REMNANT carpet and the man that we spoke to about that was SO rude and UNPROFESSIONAL. If I already hadn’t have had my other tickets written up, I would have walked out of that store with out spending the $3k that I did.

Review.Titre: Coffee table goes from bad to worse
Review.Contenu: We were looking for a coffee table and we found a cool looking table in the clearance section. We bought it got it home and it fell apart. I looked it over and I couldn’t believe how it was assembled with very thin nails. We put it back together and reinforced it. I love RC Willey. This was the only furniture that I had from them that fell apart.

Review.Titre: Mattress was several days late in…
Review.Contenu: Mattress was several days late in delivery thru Fed Ex.  I purchased thru RC Willey because I wanted an RC Willey delivery.  Also, mattress was advertised as including a matching pillow.  There was no pillow in the mattress box.

Review.Titre: Horrible customer service
Review.Contenu: I ordered some furniture from the Meridian store. When it was finally in and delivered, it was not what we wanted. I called in almost every day for a week trying to get this resolved. The people in customer service were of no help. I even talked to an office supervisor, Nicole, and she was the least knowledgeable and most condescending of them all! I tried calling my salesman with never an answer. The last time I called I got Emily. She was amazing!! She showed kindness, understanding, and completely went above and beyond to help me. She was amazing and the only reason I will ever shop RC Willey again. She needs a raise!

Review.Titre: The experience was fine
Review.Contenu: The experience was fine. I had looked for weeks to get the dining table I wanted. When I finally decided on a table and chairs with RC Willey I just spoke to to the sales clerk and told her that I wanted the table. She looked on the website and found that it was in stock and set up the delivery for the next day available. It was efficient and fast. I had to call the main store to pay for it. The transaction went smooth. I will know for sure of my satisfaction when I receive the table in my kitchen. I appreciate the efficiency of all concerned thus far.

Review.Titre: Ordering was easy
Review.Contenu: Ordering was easy. Couch came in a timely manner. Delivery came on time and the delivery men were polite and efficient. The couch seems well made

Review.Titre: I would have given five stars but I…
Review.Contenu: I would have given five stars but I ordered on a Sunday and got emails all night long while I was asleep and one early Monday morning. These were confirmations of shipping and arrival of the package. However, the item was arriving on Monday! Yes, less than 24 hours later. And only then did I know I had to be home to sign for the package. I had appointments I could not change. The FedEx delivery person had to come back twice. The product that I ordered is fantastic!

Review.Titre: Old mattress disposal issues
Review.Contenu: Typically customers are going to spend $2000 on a new mattress.  On top of that we pay for delivery of another $100. The current dumps refuse to except mattresses  from us. Then we get to the.mattress can't have stains and must be in a mattress bag and be " pristine " before you'll take. If they are pristine we wouldn't need to buy a new mattress would we. Cone on make it easier for us spending that much.

Review.Titre: I love this store & your wonderful…
Review.Contenu: I love this store & your wonderful customer service!! The only reason I didn't give you five stars is that you don't tell if an item is in stock or not. I had picked out a few items, but when trying to schedule delivery it would only give me a pick up date. And the pick up was for a store in another state. It didn't tell me which item was the problem child. I had to delete an item at a time to figure it out. Otherwise LOVE your store!

Review.Titre: Everything is great
Review.Contenu: Everything is great, but the declared delivery date does not match the actual one

Review.Titre: Happy Customer
Review.Contenu: All the personnel we have dealt with have been wonderful. Our only reason for not giving five stars is that several of the items we had delivered had issues and had to be taken back and redelivered.

Review.Titre: It took a bit longer to figure out how…
Review.Contenu: It took a bit longer to figure out how to send something to another address than mine, but we got it figured.

Review.Titre: delivery time confusion and different than advised
Review.Contenu: arrived in good shape and only two days after ordering.  The one big negative, i recieved three different notifications on delivery time- very confusing and made it difficult to plan other things i needed to do.  further, even the delivery app that shows  where the truck was located was not correct.  (i.e. still showed them a mile away when the knocked on the door.  I had even called in the morning for guidance and they told me just to go with one of three.  Delivery time actually did not line up with any of the three provided notifications or what they told me on the phone.  very strange and this did not happen on a previous order.

Review.Titre: Promise not fulfillrd
Review.Contenu: I loved the delivery tracking and accuracy of the delivery window.I called the store to order, but the computer system was down.  The agent told me that he would give a note to a sales person to call me when it came back up.  I never got a call.  After closing time, I finally went on-line and ordered my TV.  I had wanted to give the commission to a local resident, but failed.  I am disappointed.

Review.Titre: Easy to order online and speedy…
Review.Contenu: Easy to order online and speedy delivery!Only complaint is... if you're spending a substantial amount on an appliance, I struggle to see why an $8.00 part is not included? I had to run around town to find a simple part to install my appliance when after spending approximately $1000, an $8.00 part cant be included. Fail in that regard.

Review.Titre: Appliances IN STOCK!
Review.Contenu: The simple fact that you guys actually have stuff in stock and available for purchase sets you apart these days.  And for us, your willingness to deliver over to Wyoming means we'll deal with you whenever feasible. The only reason its not 5 stars was that we had some issues with the website, but nothing major.

Review.Titre: Good product, good price.
Review.Contenu: I feel like I received a good product at a fair price.  I was very happy with my furniture and it matched my room, just as I had hoped it would.  Only downside was a kind of a long wait at will call when they didn't appear to be busy at all.  Still, the experience was pretty good and the staff was friendly,

Review.Titre: I got a very comfortable recliner for…
Review.Contenu: I got a very comfortable recliner for about half the cost. My problem is I bought it for my husband to recover from a cancer surgery and they won’t have it delivered until way after his surgery. It’s frustrating when you see RC Willey trucks go by you house once a week?

Review.Titre: Experience almost perfect.
Review.Contenu: The delivery was exceptional.  Items were nicely packaged, and all pieces arrived in great condition.  Only problem there were no directions on how to assemble the furniture included, which presented a challenge.  Had directions been included I would have given a 5+ rating.

Review.Titre: Your website is well constructed
Review.Contenu: Your website is well constructed, and I was able to find what I wanted fairly easily.  I live chat person on your website to answer questions is perhaps the only reason I gave you 4 rather than 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Expensive but helpful customer support
Review.Contenu: Expensive, offer for $25 off for email sign up didn’t work on certain items.Update 8/14/23: After receiving the below response and following through with those instructions, I never heard back!Update: Thank you for following through, I received the credit. I appreciate the honestly and customer support.

Review.Titre: Online Ordereing.
Review.Contenu: My review is pertaining to the ordering via the website. The Boise staff has always been great and this is the first time I ordered off the web instead of in the store. Ordering was easy, but my only suggestion would be to have tracking information to know when an item has arrived exactly.

Review.Titre: I had made an online purchase of a…
Review.Contenu: I had made an online purchase of a laptop computer to pick up the same day because it said the laptop was in stock at the Henderson, NV store.  When I called to give them a heads-up I would be coming to get it, the lady on the phone said the laptop was in Utah!  She gave me the 800 number to check on this, so in doing that the lady who helped me said the information provided by the prior employee was not correct, and the laptop is in fact in stock in Henderson, NV.  She created a new order # for me and I was able to pick up the laptop the same day in Henderson, NV.  Not sure what the prior employee was looking at in telling me it was not in stock, but the employee in Utah did the right thing to ensure I would get the laptop the same day.  Thank you

Review.Titre: Overall good experience
Review.Contenu: Overall good experience. Easily ordered a new tv in the app but when followed the instructions to call the store 30 minutes before arriving so the product could be ready, a team member said they don’t do that for mobile orders.

Review.Titre: The whole experience through ordering…
Review.Contenu: The whole experience through ordering online, the follow up texts and calls were very helpful. The delivery people were efficient in putting the stationary bike together. The review would have been a five star, but the bike monitor came with a crack on the outside of the viewer. So we’ll have to go through the process again for a return.

Review.Titre: Browsing for a new bedroom set
Review.Contenu: I have made many purchases at RC Willey in Boise and every time I go into the store, all the staff is friendly. The only reason for the 4 stars vs. the 5 stars is one of the sales people followed us around the store after introducing himself. We let him know that we would find him if we need assistance but he was following us around the store, definitely felt like we were being stalked. He was nice guy and all but it was a bit much. My wife and I laughed it off but it could make some other customer's feel differently. We ended up not finding what we wanted in the store so I went home and purchased a bedroom set online. My wife did purchase a little novelty piece while we were in the store and the gal behind the counter was great.

Review.Titre: Good pickup. Bad website.
Review.Contenu: Easy and quick pickup at the doc. Available on time as stated in the order for an online purchase. I bought it online. The website kept glitching and erroring throughout the checkout process. It took me an hour just to checkout one item online. And it was not my internet connection

Review.Titre: Everything was good except the phone number
Review.Contenu: Everything was good except that the phone number I was given to call 30 minutes before the will call pickup was not the number of the store and I had to be transferred 3 times to get to that person.  Even then, when I arrived, my order wasn't ready (although I only had to wait a few minutes.)  Seems like you could give the direct number

Review.Titre: It was nice to be able to shop and buy…
Review.Contenu: It was nice to be able to shop and buy , and schedule delivery without having to call and speak to a representative... I've been a customer for about 8 years...

Review.Titre: My first review was negative because I…
Review.Contenu: My first review was negative because I didn’t know what Free Garage Delivery meant I didn’t know it meant no assembly from drivers. I guess that was my fault this was my first time ordering from RC Williey they could have asked me if I needed help with assembly as an above and beyond I would have had it assembled sorry I share in the misunderstanding!!

Review.Titre: LG delivery
Review.Contenu: The internet dept person was absolute fantastic! She helped so much. It took about 3 transfers to get to her. But when I got her on the phone it was smooth sailing !

Review.Titre: Everything worked fine
Review.Contenu: Everything worked fine. Ordered a TV stand and could pick it up next day. Pick-up guy was super nice and helped me to load the stand into the car. It was a tight fit at the end. Only 4 stars because I never receive a confirmation email and had to request this from customer support.

Review.Titre: The only issue I had was not being able…
Review.Contenu: The only issue I had was not being able to change the delivery date to the 26th of April. I selected it on the calender window but it wouldn't seem to update on the order. Other than that it went very well

Review.Titre: Quick and easy process
Review.Contenu: Quick and easy process. Unfortunately was rang up for the wrong item, but my fault for not looking over my order. I would return for future purchases!

Review.Titre: Everyone was very helpful and friendly
Review.Contenu: Everyone was very helpful and friendly. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because of the shipping being so expensive for out of area shoppers.

Review.Titre: Brenda Dawson did such a great job…
Review.Contenu: Brenda Dawson did such a great job helping decorate my new home, and helped me save money on an online order too!

Review.Titre: had trouble ordering on line..went to…
Review.Contenu: had trouble ordering on line..went to Layton store  salespeople unable to help  came home and worked thru accounts/billing department folks and was able to order on line

Review.Titre: My experience was better than most
Review.Contenu: My experience was better than most, but the process took too long, therefore four stars

Review.Titre: Refrigerator order with delivery...hit, then miss, then fixed.
Review.Contenu: Simple, fast.  Good connection after the fact between the order I placed, and the separate request I made for a specific delivery date on that order.  By the time the delivery call was made to confirm with me, that information had been connected.  Unfortunately, the installation of the water line for the refrigerator was missed, and this was never given as an option during check-out.  The delivery coordinator did a great job of noticing that miss, correcting it, and crediting the cost.  Nice work!

Review.Titre: TCL TV delivery.
Review.Contenu: Ordered item online. it was delivered in a timely manner, however, they would not mount it on my wall mount.

Review.Titre: I've been a long time customer to RC…
Review.Contenu: I've been a long time customer to RC Willie for well over. 25 years. My experience has always been great most of the time I have gotten rebates and coupons this time when I shopped on line I had a coupon from the mail that they had sent out and the things the item I wanted to purchase was excluded from the coupon. I don't know how many other people have shopped RC Willie website with a coupon expecting to use it and make a purchase and not being able toBecause they wanted to use that coupon. I made a purchase anyways I made a purchase anyway.  Thank you for a great experience on the website.

Review.Titre: Everything was great!!
Review.Contenu: Everything was great. My item came out quickly and was loaded carefully by two very pleasant young men.  I wish Wiley of Meridian ID would better mark the Will Call area.  We had to go inside and ask where it was at. It is sort of hidden.  Otherwise, everything was perfect.

Review.Titre: Haul Away Info?
Review.Contenu: The experience wast mostly great; however, I couldn't find any information on the website about whether or not RC Willey hauls off old appliances with a delivery.

Review.Titre: Overall service was great
Review.Contenu: Overall service was great!  Took a little time for the "operator" to get someone on the phone who could answer the one question I had, hence the 4 star rating.

Review.Titre: Website was easy to use but picture…
Review.Contenu: Website was easy to use but picture quality varied. Hard to see details of furniture in some pictures.

Review.Titre: Would have liked more reviews that…
Review.Contenu: Would have liked more reviews that weren't paid for!  Had to go to the internet b before making a decision on the purchase

Review.Titre: Ease of buying and shipping were great
Review.Contenu: Ease of buying and shipping were great. But there was damage to one of the towers because both shelves fell out during shipping.

Review.Titre: Love our sales person but the wrong…
Review.Contenu: Love our sales person but the wrong chairs were delivered and then our table was delivered missing a piece.

Review.Titre: Revised Reward Program opinion
Review.Contenu: The buying experience was pleasant and easy because we’ve been long standing RC Willey customers (1988). However, our last purchases in 2020 and 2021 both “included” a rewards program promise Blue Rewards? So during “checkout” no mention of rewards discounts or free delivery etc, etc, etc were mentioned or adjustments made to our purchase price for these earned rewards from past purchases?  So I went to the cashier window and asked for my rewards balance?? No records were found and I was advised that I was emailed reward documents that needed to be presented at time of purchase??? What a pain in the Fanny!Who does that - those credits should be reflected in my account - they are for my airline and hotel miles. So I receive no rewards for my washer/dryer/love seat/recliner/2 area rug/ and carpet with install over the last 3 years. I went in my email and found one “reward” notice that wanted me to register for the program.  Why should that be necessary - to receive promotion emails which I get routinely as a result of my account information. Registration should be automatic and rewards banked — my opinion is this is a promotional joke!!! And future RC WILLEY shopping my be considered more carefully.RC Willey read and responded to my concerns. My understanding of the program was flawed - however,  prior rewards were documented and awarded to my purchase after management review. I’ve raised my rating because my value experience at the store has always been fantastic - this mix up was corrected promptly and effectively.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: I love my stools.  They were shipped in a timely manner and I received shipment and delivery notices.  3 of the 4 boxes were received in good shape. 1 box looked dropped on a top corner.  Upon opening - great instructions and they were easy to put together. There was one broken part.  I sent an email as it was a holiday weekend about the broken part and I received a call early the next business day.  The part was shipped and received in good order.  My only other problem was a tape that was around the seat backs - when taken off - it removed some of the finish on the edges the width of the tape. This happened on 3 of 4.  Now - I’ve taken a sharpie and can hardly tell where that was.  The 4th chair thankfully didn’t have this tape. There is one more thing - there is one corner of a seat back that is dented  - probably from that drop referred to above. Could have been from the store or a shipper - but not large enough to get another seat back. Because of the tape- the stools are not pristine perfect - but they are beautiful and complimented by company. Comfortable, look good, great swivel, and easy to put together.   I highly recommend.

Review.Titre: It would have been 5 but site…
Review.Contenu: It would have been 5 but site automatically inserts $99 shipping even when pick-up is checked.

Review.Titre: Easy to navigate
