Review.Contenu: The website is super easy to use, but it did tell my the items I was trying to purchase were sold out on multiple occasions when they weren't actually sold out so that was frustrating.

Review.Titre: This was online activity
Review.Contenu: This was online activity.  I was glad to find this product online.  I was not told about htis product in the store so perhaps the sales people were not aware of it.  he referred me to a product that was in the store but not as good.

Review.Titre: The delivery guys were great
Review.Contenu: The delivery guys were great. I bought online and wished there was more instructions on what needed to be done to install. They said because we didn’t purchase the hose they couldn’t do the service that I paid extra for. I don’t blame them, i was replacing a current appliance so I didn’t need a new hose. Other than that we love the oven and the delivery guys were as helpful as they could be!

Review.Titre: You make it easy to shop and always…
Review.Contenu: You make it easy to shop and always appreciate that.

Review.Titre: This is a review for store in Biose
Review.Contenu: This is a review for store in Biose - Been shopping at RC Willey for 3 years and prices are always very fair. I had to stay for my son for a delivery today and they were an hour behind which was a bit inconvenient but they were very polite.

Review.Titre: Online was pretty simple even for a…
Review.Contenu: Online was pretty simple even for a technically challenged person like me just wish there was more of an incentive for buying online.

Review.Titre: Description of the cabinet needed better identification of the material
Review.Contenu: The description of the cabinet needed to include the material the cabinet was made of.

Review.Titre: The site was pretty easy to use
Review.Contenu: The site was pretty easy to use. reason for 4 stars there was a glitch and wouldn't take my payment at first so had to redue.

Review.Titre: The site was deceptive
Review.Contenu: The site was deceptive. It showed the unit I wanted as available but then when I tried to order showed sold out!

Review.Titre: Website was exceptional
Review.Contenu: The products were in stock, the website was easy to navigate and had all of the options as if I was working with a salesman as far as financing, delivery, install. The one thing I didn't like was I paid for the delivery and install and tried to add the accoutrements to have the appliances installed but it wouldn't let me.

Review.Titre: Good experience
Review.Contenu: The sales rep was knowledgeable and about the furniture that I bought. She was helpful and friendly. I would definitely go to RC Willey again.

Review.Titre: Easy to order
Review.Contenu: Easy to order, available and quick responses time. I haven't picked it up yet so 4

Review.Titre: JOB DONE!!!
Review.Contenu: I was able to compare product

Review.Titre: Online site is easy to navigate.
Review.Contenu: It was easy to navigate. I had a coupon and was able to use it so that was great.  Can't wait to get my patio umbrella!

Review.Titre: UPDATED
Review.Contenu: You better hope that you never need any sort of follow up with this company, otherwise you are screwed.   I got my washer/dryer delivered in February 2023. RCWILLEY brought them over (their delivery lads are lovely), and I was supposed to have installation of new washer/dryer and removal of old appliances.  The delivery folks couldn't install my washer as I had a leak in my plumbing... Ok not their fault.   I called their customer service that day and they told me that "yes, once my plumbing is fixed they can come back and finish installing my new washer and remove the old one." It's Reno, we've had horrible weather this last month.  I couldn't get a plumber in until last week (first week of March).   I called Thursday to get my order finished up, I'm bounced around to every department and given a number for Lisa.   I leave a message for Lisa.   I get no call back.  I called on Friday, bounced around again.  Saturday, bounced around again.  I leave a request for some sort of human who knows what they're doing to call me back on their email support system.  Do I get a response?  NO.  I've ordered multiple purchases from this company throughout the years.  Their lack of customer service and zero response has urged me to NEVER do business with them again.  Think maybe if I flame them online and file something with BBB they'll actually come in and install my damn washer like I paid them to do??UPDATE ON 03/16/23: I spoke with Appliances manager Caplan (sorry if misspelled) on 03/14/23 as they had seen my nasty review on trustpilot.  He was friendly and let me vent a little bit about the sucky phone tag I had to play.  He got me scheduled to have delivery folks come back in to get my washer installed, and they came today so I'm updating my review.  I'm giving RCWilley experience 4 stars for three reasons.  1:  YOUR PHONE ETIQUETTE WHEN A CUSTOMER CALLS INTO YOUR MAIN STORE WITH A PROBLEM SUCKS.   If someone doesn't really know what to do with you, they just transfer you around endlessly until you give up.    Once you finally do get someone on the phone who knows what they're doing, they're great.  Always friendly.  But it's the getting to someone who can help that is the issue.  2: When I purchased my washer/dryer, the website did NOT tell me I needed hoses/vents for installation.  Best Buy (oh yah, I'm mentioning them) automatically adds the items to the cart and you have to manually remove them if they aren't needed.  I ended up buying from RCWilley because I always have good experiences with deliveries and had (previously) never had a problem with the company.    NO I was not aware that I needed those items, and adding some hard-to-see "suggested" items on your website isn't cutting it, RCW.   3:  I shouldn't have to write out a public nasty online to get some results.   I personally don't really like complaining loudly in public, particularly about companies I really like, it makes me feel uncomfy like I'm an evil witch.  But I felt it was the only way I could get someone to contact me back! Your positives are:  Once you get someone on the phone they're lovely.  Delivery folks are always great, and the items I've purchased in the past (chairs, dining set, loveseat, washer/dryer) are always good quality and price.

Review.Titre: Everything
Review.Contenu: Everything, professional, and perfect on the delivery, with the exception that the delivery window was not honored, and the delivery came an hour and 15 minutes before the window, which was specified in your communications.

Review.Titre: Some times the sale rep doesn’t know…
Review.Contenu: Some times the sale rep doesn’t know about the difference for ea brand

Review.Titre: Great experience
Review.Contenu: Great experience, easy to purchase online. Disappointing that it wouldn’t allow me to use my $25 off a $99 purchase coupon. That’s my only complaint, which they would credit me $25 considering the amount I spent.

Review.Titre: A little cumbersome trying to find all…
Review.Contenu: A little cumbersome trying to find all the info re my purchase. Or type of wood , options available.  But was overall a pleasant experience.  I hope I made the right decision/ choice re. My selection!!

Review.Titre: Was hoping that they’ll be more…
Review.Contenu: Was hoping that they’ll be more pictures of the product than just 2

Review.Titre: It was easy to order and they were…
Review.Contenu: It was easy to order and they were quick to bring it out to me at will call.

Review.Titre: 4 Stars
Review.Contenu: Just about everything was fantastic! The lady at the distribution center was kind and knowledgable. The gentlemen delivering the fridge were respectful, funny, and thorough. The automated messages were concise and very helpful. The fridge itself- there are scuff marks on the interior. I can't scrub them out. When I removed a shelf to adjust its placement, a long hair was trapped behind it. Not my hair nor the delivery gentlemen. In the future, I would like to know when I order an item from RC Willey if it has been refurbished or had been previously bought and returned by another customer.

Review.Titre: Was pretty smooth picking it up
I would give you 5 stars
Review.Contenu: I would give you 5 stars, but you sent the wrong cord for my dryer. I had ordered the correct one. I had to come into the store to exchange it. Kind of a hassle going back and forth through 4 different staff and walking all over the store to do it. I feel like better customer service would have been staff doing the run around.

Review.Titre: Needed a new bed.
Review.Contenu: My daughter broke her bed I went online to see what inventory RC Willey had I’ve always loved RC Willey we found a bed that my daughter loved within a very short amount of time was able to purchase it online very easy process

Review.Titre: Very good experience
Review.Contenu: Very good experience. Wish that we could get a firm date for delivery. Also, we were not able to make a credit card payment to the store. Had to go on line.

Review.Titre: Your website is very confusing
Review.Contenu: Your website is very confusing. Every time I tried to order it put me out. I also tried to apply for credit because of no interest. Again put me out. I would of bought more items since I just moved to Nevada from Florida with no furniture!

Review.Titre: Online purchase
Review.Contenu: In trying to make an online purchase, it took several attempts to get my purchase completed.  Just had to keep starting over, re-entering my info several times, until finally completed, don't know what the problem was.

Review.Titre: The salesman was great
Review.Contenu: The salesmen, especially Jameson was very helpful  However I am very disappointed in the customer service follow thru and the quality of the beds.    This last bed I bought and have only had about a month, it is already sagging after having to switch the first one out, both remotes have gone bad.  When I called customer service there was no follow thru on a tech coming to my home to check it out and this is the second time in less than a year.  I guess I will have to find another store after many years.

Review.Titre: No communication **fixed**
Review.Contenu: I've received no communication about my order. Amazon emails too much, RC Willey gives me nothing.Ha, I got a response right after I submitted this. Impressive.

Review.Titre: Delivery went great
Review.Contenu: Delivery went great!  I thought the arcade machine would have already been assembled.  That is the only thing that I was not happy with.

Review.Titre: Ordering and picking up my Nordic trac…
Review.Contenu: Ordering and picking up my Nordic trac bike could not have been easier. The website was easy to navigate and having the choice of picking up at the distribution center the next day was a great advantage. The only reason I didn’t give a 5th star was simply the wait time we had at pick up. The center opened at 10. And even though we were there early it still took over 25 minutes to get served. Even though I saw my box every time the service door opened so I knew my order was ready. But other than that, I can totally recommend RC Willey and I will for sure purchase there again

Review.Titre: I like the selection that RC Willey has…
Review.Contenu: I like the selection that RC Willey has to offer. However, I think that RC Willey can do better on their pricing. I enjoyed their customer service, especially working with Beau Garcia, It was a pleasurable experience. It was very easy to increase our credit limit and getting our statements online or in the mail is very convenient. The delivery and installation staff was very fast and the staff were very friendly. Overall I give RC Willey four stars I think that their prices are a bit too high.

Review.Titre: I've bought other furniture from RC…
Review.Contenu: I've bought other furniture from RC Willey and the delivery was on time, respectful and the guys were always helpful.The web site is pretty easy to understand and follow. For me that was extremely important.So when I wanted to replace a refrigerator in my new home they were my 1st thought.

Review.Titre: Online search and purchase was easy
Review.Contenu: Online search and purchase was easy. The order lead me to believe it would be available at the store for pickup. When I arrived I was still in the warehouse. I should have called ahead as you recommended but I didn't

Review.Titre: Easy ordering and pick up.
The delivery was seamless and the…
Review.Contenu: The delivery was seamless and the delivery men were careful not to scuff walls and interior of my house. The reason for the 4 stars is, I found a 4" scratch on the left side of the refrigerator and a small scratch on the freezer door handle. Other than the aforementioned scratches, my experience with the delivery was pleasant.

Review.Titre: Delivery driver
Review.Contenu: The reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because the delivery driver doesnt care about time frames. I ordered a sofa and loveseat. He show up 20 mins before the time frame he was suppose to arrive. I was not happy at all. Also ge didnt help me bring up the couches he watched me struggle with my lady and in the end sayed bye like come on now. He could of gone above and beyond and at least brought them to the door.

Review.Titre: Loser Sales Persons
Review.Contenu: We like RC Willey. We have been pleased with the quality and price of products we have bought. We recently had a negative experience at the Layton store however. We wanted to buy a recliner, and we couldn’t find a salesman to help us even though there seems to be plenty of them standing around with nothing to do. So we came home and brought the recliner online.

Review.Titre: GOOD
Review.Contenu: Friendly and Helpful

Review.Titre: This is our second purchase from RC…
Review.Contenu: This is our second purchase from RC Willey and I am pleased to say they are always within their time window for delivery. The men who came were very helpful and even moved our old kitchen table onto the patio for us. The only thing that was wrong was one of the cushions on a chair was damaged. The men assured us that RC Willey would be sending us out a new chair in the near future.

Review.Titre: went to buy 2 ipads
Review.Contenu: went to buy 2 ipads, there were only the expensive ones in stock at the store, was able to get an ipad mini , the salesperson who helped us was very nice and tried to get us the products we came for.  We left with one and I oredered the one I wanted from the website

Review.Titre: Washer and dryer different colors
Review.Contenu: We purchased a matching washer and dryer.  When the delivery people arrive the washer was stainless and the dryer was white.  They delivered the correct dryer a few days later. All in all, we were satisfied with the product and service and the quick problem resolution

Review.Titre: So far so good
Review.Contenu: So far so good. Ordering was easy enough online for a cabinet that hopefully matches a desk I bought earlier. Have to pick it up which is a bummer but, it's reasonably priced so can't complain.  Wish they kept their population items in stock more.  Too many pieces are a little too modern and well cheap looking. Having said that I do like some of their inexpensive pieces that furnished the other office 8n the house. Size wise it fit perfectly without crowding the guest bed and the dimensions were dead on which doesn't happen often. 😊

Review.Titre: RC Willey is an outstanding furniture…
Review.Contenu: RC Willey is an outstanding furniture store. Their service and commitment to their customers is awesome.  We started shopping there about a year ago while furnishing a second home. The selection is amazing. The sales people allow you to look by yourself if you want and which I prefer. Their delivery staff has been very careful when bringing items into the house. The whole process is a 10! A big shout out to Robert Otto who has been helping us.  He's great!

Review.Titre: One error to sleepless nights!
Review.Contenu: Reordered a smaller base mattress and the wrong one was delivered!  Now it’s another week to get the right one.  Hopefully the right one will be delivered!  If not we’ll ask them to cancel the order and return our mattress as well and will not do business with RC Willey ever again !

Review.Titre: Short on sales discount
Review.Contenu: You advertise savings discounts we bought multiple items but unfortunately no signs that discounts do not apply if you buy in our clearance budget room even though the bedding mattresses are brand new.  I spent over $2,000 including a tv I would of expected some discount.  At least if I bought a floor model tv in clearance they offered $50 off. Spend more get more is misleading.  Felt disappointed at the register and that the sales people hadn't given a heads up on that.

Review.Titre: I really like the office chair
Review.Contenu: I really like the office chair, it is comfortable and relatively easy to assemble. I did not like that I received a defective cover for the headrest screw plate. I could tell by the packaging that the parts were repackaged. So I would highly suggest to RC Willey to double-check all the parts before they send them out.

Review.Titre: I ordered an ottoman from RC Willey's…
Review.Contenu: I ordered an ottoman from RC Willey's Online. When I received the shipping e-mail, I assumed it would be a 2 week wait. Trying to navigate the RC Willey's was a miserable experience, and I stopped several times. Today I finally figured how to get the info, only to discover the package had been delivered 8 days previously! I thought it was lost; I started s complaint-case. I checked with family, again, and found the package shunted into a room, because they were gone for a few days. So I cancelled to complaint. Four stars in stead of five because of the difficulty with the website. The ottoman is just what I wanted.

Review.Titre: Packaging was excellent
Review.Contenu: Packaging was excellent. Very padded and wrapped with protective foam.  Everything clearly labeled and directions very easy to read and follow.  My only complaint is the top of the desk has many scratches. Otherwise, it’s a sturdy, attractive desk.  Solidly built.

Review.Titre: My experience at the warehouse was very…
Review.Contenu: My experience at the warehouse was very professional the customer service as well as the gentleman who delivered the box onto the will call ramp were both very professional Thank you Faith Martinez

Review.Titre: Beautiful but not the best quality
Review.Contenu: I like the stools but they are not the best quality. When we put them together there were dents in the stand on all of them. They are beautiful but seem to be made a little on the cheap side. But they do look lovely in our kitchen and they are extremely comfortable.

Review.Titre: Your stuff is a bit pricey but....
Review.Contenu: Your stuff is a bit pricey but I've gotten a sofa, 2 chairs, night stand and lamp in the past year and they have all been good quality merchandise. Especially like the night stand with the 2 charging ports, use one for my cell and the other for my Oasis Kindle

Review.Titre: The web site worked just fine
Review.Contenu: The web site worked just fine.  The only issue was I could not request a later delivery date.  Not a real problem, I will just have to find a place to store it until I can get it installed.

Review.Titre: My salesperson
Review.Contenu: My salesperson, Kate Donovon, was so nice! She took her time to show me different recliners. I not only bought the recliner but a couch too! I have purchased many items from RC Willey, all great. Kate should be rewarded for kindness and professionalism. Very happy repeat customer!

Review.Titre: Very satisfied  customer…
Review.Contenu: I have been with R C Willey since the 70's, they are always willing to do whatever it takes to meet your needs

Review.Titre: Got it when I needed it
Review.Contenu: The washing machine I needed was in stock and available for pick up within 2 days from order.  No other retailer in town had this item.

Review.Titre: very pleasant experience
Review.Contenu: very helpful staff, went out there way to help with online order ,great attitude

Review.Titre: We’ve shopped RC for many years but…
Review.Contenu: We’ve shopped RC for many years but after moving to AZ purchasing products has been for the most part impossible due to shipping issues/cost. The order we just placed was easy, shipping cost, etc was great. Hoping larger items for us become more affordable & available.

Review.Titre: Needed a new dining room set
Review.Contenu: I was beginning to search for a dining room set which usually takes me awhile because I go everywhere to see the different types of furniture. I couldn’t have been in the store for more than 5 minutes and I found a perfect set.  Checking out was a breeze I don’t think my total time in there was a half hour

Review.Titre: Good experience from start to finish
Review.Contenu: Ordered a new freezer online that was delivered the next day and right on time.  The crew was super careful removing our old freezer and installing the new one.

Review.Titre: I have bought several appliances from…
Review.Contenu: I have bought several appliances from RC Willy over the past year and have had no issues.  On line ordering is super easy and the Reno store is a breeze to go and pick up your order

Review.Titre: The delivery staff were great!
Review.Contenu: The delivery staff were great!The online experience was diminished due to the inability to use a $50 dollar off code and the deceptive claim that a free air fryer rack would be included in my purchase of the range. Please do not have statements that are 100% untrue on the website for purchases.

Review.Titre: Online, hassle free shopping experience …
Review.Contenu: I found a desk I liked online and already the next day FedEx has sent me the shipping label.   I get very busy and so far this has been a fast, hassle free way to shop.  Thanks.

Review.Titre: Customer service to the rescue!
Review.Contenu: I purchased an Apple iPad on line and the following day I noticed I had it to be delivered while we would be away.  I called your online Customer service and Tom made it very easy to change my order to a customer pick up. I was very happy! I just picked up my iPad just in time for my Son to get a wonderful Christmas present.

Review.Titre: Quick & Easy
Review.Contenu: From the time I ordered my washing machine online until we picked it up was less than 2 hours. It was there waiting and was quickly loaded for us. It was much better than waiting 1 week for delivery.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: Greeted immediately as I came through door.  Again greeted at my vehicle and they handled the merchandise with care as they loaded it in and verified it was all in good condition.

Review.Titre: Best Rocking Recliner
Review.Contenu: Great selection great customer service. A little disappointed you don’t offer free in home delivery

Review.Titre: Simply satisfied!
Review.Contenu: The order was received the date I was told. The guys were very polite & unloaded my freezer & set it up, for me.This is the 1st time I’ve ordered online.Site unseen & was Leary about ordering.I was more than satisfied with this purchase!

Review.Titre: Very cute website
Review.Contenu: Very cute website, good prices. But unfortunately delivery takes too much time.

Review.Titre: The sales person went above and beyond…
Review.Contenu: The sales person went above and beyond to ensure our online order went through.

Review.Titre: Was surprised to see how many electric…
Review.Contenu: Was surprised to see how many electric fireplaces on display in the showroom. The salesman was very friendly and polite, he explained about the one we were interested in. We did not purchase immediately because I wanted to shop around and see if I could find more styles in the size I needed then went home and ordered on the website.

Review.Titre: Had a nice experience shopping here
Review.Contenu: Had a nice experience shopping here. Worked with Dustin Shaw,  who has always been helpful, patient and accommodating!

Review.Titre: Great place to shop for furniture and accessories
Review.Contenu: I have made several purchases in the last few years at the Summerlin location and have always had a great experience! My salesperson, Michael McDuffy is amazing and is always there to help and explain all options in the buying process and makes the experience an easy one. I always ask for Michael when I come in and always greets me with a smile and we get to work with what I’m looking for and have always been very pleased with my purchase! I also love the 18 month interest free option when buying on my RC Willey card!

Review.Titre: Online order
Review.Contenu: I called the associate that I have been working with, James Smith, to ask about the stools. He directed me to order then online which was a breeze. Nice confirmation back quickly about the order. Couldn’t be more pleased.

Review.Titre: Courtesy and professional
Review.Contenu: Always professional and honest and will get you the answers you need.  All departments are extremely helpful.

Review.Titre: Fantastic ! Buying from RC Willey is a no-brainer.
Review.Contenu: Fantastic !!  From walking in the front door to saying goodbye ..  RC Willey is truly is a company dedicated to Customer Service, as in unwavering Customer service !!    The two ‘P’ words I love , Professional and Perfectionist !!   My RC Willey sales associate, Jared Waddington, was both !!  RC Willey is the behemoth supermarket for every conceivable home good.   RC Willey offers extensive inventories on every item for your home.   But it is not the inventory which sets RC Willey in a class Above and Beyond.   It is extraordinary personalities.  Personality is something you can’t teach.   It is an intangible.  Combine personality with extensive product knowledge, with the ability to convey that knowledge, and with unmatched and unparalleled service and you have an irreplaceable asset.   RC Willey has just such an asset in Jared Waddington.  Buying from RC Willey is a no-brainer.   You absolutely won't find a better product, a better price, and most importantly, better service than at RC Willey.  Mikey from the Quaker Oats Life cereal advertisement says it perfectly  “ Try It, You’ll Love It” !!

Review.Titre: Taking the time for a handicap person…
Review.Contenu: Taking the time for a handicap person and family to make sure Satisfaction, what is guaranteed for all the needs that we needed and found everything that we worked at an excellent price. Thank you so much. I appreciate.Everybody  And your staff n r c willie i've been with you forever

Review.Titre: Love RC Willey
Review.Contenu: Love RC Willey!  Great selection, extremely fair prices, and always treated us right.  They’re our “go-to” when it comes to home furniture and appliances.

Review.Titre: I had a wonderful experience with…
Review.Contenu: I had a wonderful experience with Stefanie the cashier. She was able to explain everything I asked in detail. When I came back to cash out she was busy but I was help by Thaili she was friendly and helpful. For it being a Black Friday most cashiers were getting customers out quickly. The sales associate I spoke with where great and helpful not pushing you or rushing you. Will come back to because of the great customer service experience.

Review.Titre: They are the best  help with whatever…
Review.Contenu: They are the best to help with whatever your needs are. Been a customer since 1970's

Review.Titre: Great store, excellent salesman
Review.Contenu: Justin Luke is the best salesman we’ve ever worked with. He was informative and so quick on the computer—pulling up comparables with other stores and RCW current sales. His expertise afforded us to make our choices easier and confident that we were making a great purchase for what we wanted.

Review.Titre: Always helpful and friendly staff.
Everything about my refrigerator buying…
Review.Contenu: Everything about my refrigerator buying experience was  outstanding. The sales associate Sotero Arce was extremely professional and helpful in making my product choice. Messages regarding delivery were great. The delivery guys, Robert H. and Eric Vergara, were beyond 5 star professional and friendly. Delivery was right on time as promised. I strongly recommend RC Willey to everyone I know. No better company exists!

Review.Titre: Great design and value
Review.Contenu: We are looking for some furnitures for our living room. We went to RCWilley first, then moved to 3 different stores but decided to come back to RCWilley for furniture design and affordability.

Review.Titre: Great company to do business with that appreciates your being there.
Review.Contenu: I have been buying from RC Willey for 18 years and I have never had a bad experence.  Always very professional people, fast service and always the best prices for the service you recieve.Just bought my 5th tv from the Reno, NV store and even thought the big box stores in town were about $10.00 cheaper, the service was worth every cent. Bought it on line, pick up was so fast they were waiting for me to show up and check out took 1 minute.   They have my business for life.

Review.Titre: Chris in appliances is the best
Review.Contenu: Chris in appliances is the best. Has helped me on more than one occasion and always does a great job

Review.Titre: Amazing every time
Review.Contenu: Amazing every time , the product was perfect and the delivery guys went above and beyond. Love RC Willey

Review.Titre: Great store
Review.Contenu: RC Willys furniture quality has always been good to me. The prices are pretty fair, especially during sales. Interestingly, Black Friday sales are not as good as Labor Day or memorial day sales. I also love to check the clearance department. Ines rocks!

Review.Titre: Ease of ordering and the…
Review.Contenu: Ease of ordering and the professionalism of their staff!

Review.Titre: Thanksgiving saved by Bob Pearson, Ricardo and Jake
Review.Contenu: Our refrigerator quit working on Wednesday night before Thanksgiving.  We went to RC Willey's on Friday morning.  Bob Pearson greeted us kindly and we started looking at the refrigerator selection.  Bob was excellent at helping in our selection and most importantly assisting us in a quick delivery.  In less than 1 hour from the time of purchase the new refrigerator was delivered and installed.  Ricardo and Jake on the delivery truck were super and disposed of the old fridge and installed the new fridge in no time.  Everyone was extremely professional and save my family's thanksgiving weekend.  I cannot thank Bob, Ricardo, and Jake enough for their efforts in getting the new fridge delivered and installed so quickly.

Review.Titre: She helped me through website issues
Review.Contenu: I was trying to make a purchase through the website, end was coming across some problems. She was extremely helpful and we were able to make the purchase with one of the computers at the customer service desk. She went above and beyond what was necessary.

Review.Titre: Every time I make a purchase at RCW…
Review.Contenu: Every time I make a purchase at RCW it’s a positive experience. I buy all my appliances there.

Review.Titre: The delivery men were great
Review.Contenu: The delivery men were great. They helped me to get the  tv stand installed on the TV and lift the TV into place. I live alone and was afraid I might damage the TV if I tried to do this on my own. This is the same great service I received from RC Willey 20 years ago with the TV that I was replacing. This is why I signed up for the RC Willey Blue Rewards program.

Review.Titre: Excellent service
Review.Contenu: Easy to place order online and the scheduled delivery was right on time.  I have shopped RCWilley for years and absolutely love this store!

Review.Titre: Mike Campbell helped me purchase a…
Review.Contenu: Mike Campbell helped me purchase a dishwasher plus installation over the phone for one of my rental properties ( I live in a different state). I tried for 3 days to get this accomplished through 2 Lowe’s stores and 1 Home Depot with no success. Mike was very helpful and knowledgeable, he even gave me his personal cell number so I could reach him directly. Excellent service so far, if the delivery and installation go thus well it will be a home run.

Review.Titre: Customer service was awesome!
Review.Contenu: Customer service was awesome!The gentleman that helped me was personable, professional, and knowledgeable.

Review.Titre: An easy purchase via the website!!
Review.Contenu: I have never purchased via the website before; however, this was as quick and easy a transaction as I have ever had. I knew what I wanted to buy, found it, paid for it and we were finished. Then, much to my chagrin, I realized I had messed up my order for a pick-up rather than a delivery. But, again, it only took one quick call and someone in customer service fixed MY mistake quickly and we're scheduled for a Monday delivery. Quick, easy, and painless.  THANK YOU!

Review.Titre: Never a bad experience.
Review.Contenu: Every experience I have had with RC Willey staff or purchasing online has been wonderful. Everyone is so helpful, and the online purchases are easy and straight forward. This is the only place I get furniture.

Review.Titre: RC Willey is where I go first for new…
Review.Contenu: RC Willey is where I go first for new furniture. Have never been disappointed with a product or service.

Review.Titre: We always love working with Susan
Review.Contenu: We always love working with Susan. We are pretty picky when it comes to furniture purchases and Susan always knows what to help us find. She always does an amazing job!!

Review.Titre: Ordered a chair online delivered in 2…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a chair online delivered in 2 days happy with purchase.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: I spoke on the phone with Dave about finding a lift recliner chair for a family member who is having open heart surgery.  I do not live in Utah and so was relying solely on phone conversations.  I explained that I needed something for a 6'4" man and he immediately told me that he is 6'3" and proceeded to go around the store, while I was on the phone, testing the lift chairs for me.  Dave explained the products to me as he went and was honest with me about what they had that would be appropriate for a big and tall man.  He was so friendly and helpful.  Dave, I can't thank you enough for your time and assistance!

Review.Titre: Helpful!
Review.Contenu: Mitchell was so helpful in helping us choose an induction range and installation.  A great experience.  Highly recommend.

Review.Titre: Great prices
Review.Contenu: Great prices, product and fast shipping! They have my vote and I will be shopping with them again.

Review.Titre: Great Store - Great Staff
Review.Contenu: We went looking for several things and the staff were amazing. They don’t push you but help find exactly what you’re looking for.  They are pleasant and Kembe who helped us was really helpful and nice, we changed our minds few times and he was great about it.Great choice of furniture and colors plus accessories to match. We will be back for sure.

Review.Titre: Jonathan Paskett was the salesman I…
Review.Contenu: Jonathan Paskett was the salesman I worked with. He was knowledgeable about the product and upfront about drawbacks and leadtimes. He was personable, easy to deal with, and didn’t pressure me at all. Other sales people should use him as an example of how to treat customers.

Review.Titre: New Bed
Review.Contenu: After I ordered my bed online i went on website again a couple of days later and the price went down $100 when I called customer service and after confirming all the order they matched the lower price with no issues at all.Their delivery men that came and installed were very polite, professional and did a wonderful job !

Review.Titre: CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review.Contenu: When ever I call to verify what I've ordered and double check on something else I might have forgotten or a price...the person I talk to is very pleasant, helpful and courteous!  In all my years of dealing with RC Willey I have never encountered a rude person.

Review.Titre: Love the clearance!
Review.Contenu: Whether your in the store or shopping online it is so easy to find what I need. I love that you can even shop and purchase clearance items online. There is always such a great selection of furniture,  home decor, electronics, and appliances.  Every time we look somewhere else we always end up back at RCWilley and find what we need at a great price.

Review.Titre: Easy ordering and pickup process.
We were the 1st delivery of the day
Review.Contenu: We were the 1st delivery of the day.  The guys were very courteous and even relocated my existing TV to another area.   They made the set up look like a breeze.

Review.Titre: Andri always gets me just what I need
Review.Contenu: Andri always gets me just what I need. And the delivery guys went above and beyond. Thank you.

Review.Titre: OUR RC WILLEY EXPERIENCES
Review.Contenu: We have used RC Willey- Summerlin for most homes appliances and other home items in there past and since early 2020. We had a serious conflict over cost of return claims for a  water softener which did not met our expectation and within return policy understanding. We considered  this conflict as being resolvable.  It was a very unfortunate situation. The involvement and care provided by RC Willeys Senior Manager. his direct care and interaction  can only be described as professional and kind. This intervention eventually turned preserved  us back into a loyal customer status. We recently purchases Refrigerator, laundry appliances and water softener and large screen TV's earlier.We are happy to be associated with RC Willey  and there sales and administrative staff.

Review.Titre: Outstanding Experience
Review.Contenu: We were new to the area and RC Willey had been highly recommended to us.  We were in the process of buying a new home and went to RC Willey to look at furniture and get ideas.    Upon arriving we were greeted by salesperson Michael McDuffie who was extremely knowlegable, friendly, professional and beyond helpful!  He spent several hours with us going over sectionals, tables, and dining room tables. We knew once we purchased our home we would be back to buy furniture. There was a dining room table and sideboard that we really loved but it was out of stock.  We signed up for email notifications to alert us when it would come back in stock (fingers crossed that it would!)  A few weeks later it did and I immediately reached out to Michael about it, he took care of everything and today we have our beautiful dining room table and matching sideboard in our new home!  We couldnt be happier!  Michael ensured from start to finish that the whole transaction was entered, ordered and completed.  We are 100% satisifed and highly recommend Michael McDuffie for all your shopping needs at the Summerlin location! He is a true professional and that speaks volumes for superior customer service!  Thank you Michael and RC Willey for a positive shopping experience!  April and Terry
